Mage-0.name: Arcanist
reminderText: Each point of intelligence grants 4% ward retention and improves skills that rely on carefully studied magic, such as Lightning Blast and Mana Strike.

Mage-2.name: Elementalist
description: Increases your elemental damage
reminderText: Fire, cold, and lightning damage are all considered elemental damage.

Mage-3.name: Reactive Ward
description: When you drop below 70% health you gain a burst of ward based on your maximum health. This effect has a 12 second cooldown.
reminderText: Ward is a shield that protects your health. It has no maximum and decays over time.

Mage-4.name: Preparation
description: Every 3 seconds, your next elemental spell deals increased damage and has a chance to slow enemies on hit.

Mage-5.name: Mage Flurry
notScalingStats: 9% Increased Cooldown Recovery Speed for Teleport
9% Increased Cooldown Recovery Speed for Snap Freeze

Mage-6.name: Arcane Current
description: When you hit an enemy with a lightning skill you cast {Arcane Lightning} at additional enemies, dealing lightning damage. This effect has a 5 second cooldown.
reminderText: {Arcane Lightning} is a single target lightning spell. Its damage is increased by intelligence and by increases to lightning damage and spell damage.

Mage-7.name: Arcane Flames
description: When you hit an enemy with a fire skill you {Ignite} additional nearby enemies. This effect has a 5 second cooldown.
reminderText: This effect can ignite the initial enemy you hit unless it was killed by that hit.

Mage-8.name: Warden
reminderText: Ward is a shield that protects your health. It has no maximum and decays over time. Ward retention slows that decay.

Mage-11.name: Essence of Celerity
description: Each stack of {Arcane Momentum} lasts longer and also increases your spell damage.

Mage-12.name: Mana Shell
notScalingStats: +1 Ward Per Second Per 10 Max Mana

Mage-13.name: Arcane Momentum
description:
When you cast a spell you gain a stack of {Arcane Momentum} for 2 seconds and refreshing the duration of all existing stacks.

Each stacks of Arcane Momentum increases your cast speed.
reminderText: You can only have one instance of Arcane Momentum.

Mage-14.name: Wisdom
notScalingStats: 5% Increased Mana Regen per 100 Max Mana
reminderText: This does not require exact thresholds of 100 mana. For example, gaining 10 maximum mana will always grant 0.3% increased mana regen.

Mage-15.name: Lost Knowledge
description: You gain ward based on your current mana when you directly use a skill that costs at least 40 mana.
reminderText: Ward is a decaying shield that protects your health

Mage-20.name: Calculated Destruction
notScalingStats: 3% Increased Spell Critical Strike Chance per Intelligence
reminderText: Each point of intelligence grants 4% ward retention and improves skills that rely on carefully studied magic, such as Lightning Blast and Mana Strike.

Mage-22.name: Crackling Precision
description: You have an increased chance to critically strike with spells. This effect is doubled for lightning skills.

Mage-24.name: Rune of Winter
description:
Increases your chance to freeze and converts lightning blast and volcanic orb to cold spells, changing their base damage type to cold and giving them a chance to freeze.

Lightning Blast gains a base freeze rate of 46.

Volcanic Orb's core gains a base freeze rate of 40 and its shrapnel gains a freeze rate of 32.

Mage-25.name: Chronomancy
reminderText: Each point of vitality grants 6 health and 1% poison and necrotic resistance.

Mage-27.name: Mana Bulwark
stats: 2% Damage Dealt to Mana Before Health
description: You have additional mana and a portion of the damage you take is dealt to your mana before health.

Mage-28.name: Warder
description:
You have a chance to be granted ward whenever you hit an enemy with a fire, cold, or lightning skill.

This effect has a 10 second cooldown, but the cooldown is not shared between different elements, so you can gain ward from a fire hit and a lightning hit within the same 10 second duration.

Mage-29.name: Arcane Current
notScalingStats: +100% Spark Charge Chance With Static Orb
description: You deal more lightning damage (multiplicative with other modifiers) to shocked enemies.

Mage-30.name: Archmage
stats: 7% Chance To Refund 20% Of Mana Cost
description:
You have additional spell damage and you have a chance to refund a portion of the mana cost of your skills on use.

These values are doubled if you have 300 maximum mana and tripled if you have 1000 maximum mana.

Mage-32.name: Arcane Warden
description: You gain ward when you use an elemental melee attack and hit at least one enemy.

Mage-34.name: Elemental Strikes
stats: +10% Ignite Chance For Fire Melee Attacks
+10% Chill Chance For Cold Melee Attacks
+10% Shock Chance For Lightning Melee Attacks
description: Your fire melee attacks have a chance to ignite on hit. Your cold melee attacks have a chance to chill on hit. Your lightning melee attacks have a chance to shock on hit.

Mage-35.name: Infused Weapon
stats: +2 Fire Damage For Fire Melee Attacks
+2 Cold Damage For Cold Melee Attacks
+2 Lightning Damage For Lightning Melee Attacks
description: Your melee attacks deal additional damage. The type of damage added depends on the damage type of the attack.

Mage-36.name: Frozen Steel
description: Your melee attacks deal additional cold damage and you have a higher chance to freeze enemies.

Mage-37.name: Arcane Shielding
stats: 4 Ward Per Second with Arcane Shield
description: You gain Arcane Shield for 4 seconds when you use a melee attack and hit at least one enemy. Arcane Shield is a buff that reduces damage taken and generates ward, but does not stack.
reminderText: Arcane Shield's damage reduction is multiplicative with other modifiers.

Mage-38.name: Flame Walker
notScalingStats: +50% Fire Res Shred Chance Per Second
description:
Each second if you are moving or using a melee attack you have chance to cast a {Fire Aura}. 

This chance is doubled if you do not have an active {Fire Aura}.

You can have multiple stacks of {Fire Aura} active at once.
reminderText: Fire Aura is a fire spell that deals damage over time to enemies around you for four seconds.

Mage-39.name: Warden's Echo
description:
When you use a melee attack and hit at least one enemy you have a chance to cast {Frost Claw}.

This consumes mana equal to a portion of {Frost Claw's} mana cost.

Mage-40.name: Fire Blood
reminderText: Each point of vitality grants 6 health and 1% poison and necrotic resistance.

Mage-41.name: Mana Reaver
description: You have additional health and you have a chance to regain mana when you use a melee attack and hit at least one enemy.

Mage-42.name: Incinerating Aura
notScalingStats: +1 Fire Aura Spell Damage Per 2 Intelligence
description: Your {Fire Auras} from all sources deal damage in a larger area.
reminderText: Added spell damage applies to Fire Aura at 140% effectiveness per second.

Mage-43.name: Shattered Aegis
description: Arcane Shield is much less effective, but can stack up to 4 times and also increases armour.

Mage-44.name: Crackling Aura
description: You deal increased lightning damage and Fire Aura's base damage is converted to lightning, unless it has already been converted to cold.

Mage-45.name: Sun and Storms
description:
You deal increased fire and lightning damage.

You gain ward when you use a lightning skill or a fire skill. This effect has a 7 second cooldown, but the cooldown is not shared between different elements, so you can gain ward from a fire skill and a lightning skill within the same 7 second duration.
reminderText: Ward is a shield that protects your health. It has no maximum and decays over time.

Mage-46.name: Burden of Knowledge
description: You have additional spell damage, but your spells take longer to cast.

Mage-47.name: Burning Hands
description: You have additional fire resistance and you have a chance to cast Fire Aura when you use a melee attack and hit at least one enemy.
reminderText: Fire Aura is a fire spell that deals damage over time to enemies around you for four seconds. You can have multiple stacks of Fire Aura active at once.

Mage-48.name: Volka's Razor
stats: 3% More Elemental Damage with High Cost Melee Attacks
description: Your melee attacks deal more elemental damage (multiplicative with other modifiers) if they cost 10 or more mana. This also affects the damage dealt by all the ailments they apply and the spells they trigger from their trees.

Mage-50.name: Blade Weaver
description:
When you use a melee attack that costs less than 10 mana you gain a stack of {Blade Weaving}.

When you use a melee attack that costs 10 or more mana the stacks are consumed and the attack deals 15% more elemental damage (multiplicative with other modifiers) per stack consumed.
reminderText: The damage bonus also affects the damage dealt by all the ailments the attack applies and the spells it triggers from its trees, excluding equippable spells.

Mage-51.name: Prodigy
description: You gain ward per second scaling with your intelligence.
reminderText: For example, if you have 24 Intelligence you would gain +1.6% added crit chance.

Mage-52.name: Blades of Fires
stats: 1% Increased Melee Elemental Damage Per Fire Aura
description: Each stack of Fire Aura increases your melee elemental damage.

Mage-55.name: Sphere of Protection
stats: -1% Less Damage Taken from Ignited Shocked or Chilled Enemies
description: You have additional health and you take less damage (multiplicative with other modifiers) from ignited, shocked or chilled enemies.
reminderText: The damage reduction only applies once even if an enemy is afflicted by more than one of these ailments.

Mage-56.name: Unsealed Mana
reminderText:
Skills cast during the cooldown do not count towards this effect.

Ward is a shield that protects your health. It has no maximum and decays over time.

Skills such as Mana Strike and Focus cost zero mana by default, while others such as Fireball and Lightning Blast can have their costs reduced to zero via skill tree nodes or a weapon with a -Mana Cost of Spells modifier.

If a skill costs mana, but that mana is refunded afterwards it does not count as a zero cost skill.

Mage-58.name: Arcane Wind
description: When you hit an enemy with a cold skill you {Chill} additional nearby enemies. This effect has a 5 second cooldown.
reminderText: This effect can chill the initial enemy you hit unless it was killed by that hit.

Mage-60.name: Afterglow
description: You deal increased spell damage and have additional ward retention.
reminderText: The doubled increased spell damage also applies to the skill that triggers it.

Mage-61.name: Rift Bolt
reminderText: Penetration can bring enemies below 0% resistance, causing them to take more damage. It applies to all damage, including damage over time.

Mage-62.name: Chill to the Bone
reminderText: Penetration can bring enemies below 0% resistance, causing them to take more damage. It applies to all damage, including damage over time.

Mage-63.name: Lavamancer
reminderText: Penetration can bring enemies below 0% resistance, causing them to take more damage. It applies to all damage, including damage over time.

Mage-64.name: Distant Spark
description: When you critically strike an enemy from at least 4 meters away, you have a chance to cast {Spark Nova,} a spell that deals lightning damage to nearby enemies.
reminderText: {Spark Nova} critical strikes cannot result in more Spark Novas.

Mage-66.name: Whirling Snow
stats: 7% Chance To Chill Attackers When Hit
description: You have a chance to chill enemies when you are hit, and your skills have a chance to chill enemies on hit. This effect is doubled for cold skills.

Mage-67.name: Elemental Ascendance
stats: 8% Increased Stun Chance With Elemental Spells

Mage-69.name: Arcane Insight
description: You have additional Intelligence and you gain additional ward decay threshold scaling with your Intelligence.

Mage-70.name: Freezing Aura
notScalingStats: 48 Fire Aura Freeze Rate Per Second
description: You have a higher freeze rate multiplier and Fire Aura is converted to cold. This converts its base damage and gives it a chance to freeze enemies within its area of effect.

Mage-72.name: Storm Blade
stats: 5% Spark Charge Chance with Lightning Melee Attacks
description: Your melee attacks deal additional lightning damage and your lightning melee attacks have a chance to apply a Spark Charge on hit.

Mage-73.name: Molten Edge
description: Your melee hits have a chance to ignite on hit and the ignites they inflict have increased effect.
reminderText: Increased ignite effect increases the damage of ignite, multiplicatively with other modifiers.

Mage-74.name: Flame Drinker
stats: +1 Ward Per Second Per Fire Aura
description: Each stack of Fire Aura grants you ward per second.

Mage-75.name: Prismatic Blade
reminderText: Each point of Dexterity adds 4 dodge rating and improves skills that rely on the skillfull handling of weapons, such as Mana Strike and Flame Reave.

Mage-76.name: Elixir of Knowledge
stats: 1 Ward on Potion Use per Intelligence
description: Whenever you use a potion, you gain ward based on to your intelligence.

Mage-77.name: Essence Duel
description: You have increased melee attack speed, and you gain ward when you use an elemental melee attack and hit at least one enemy.
reminderText: Ward is a shield that protects your health. It has no maximum and decays over time.

Mage-78.name: Silver Rune
description: Augments the ward gain effects of the {Reactive Ward} and {Sun and Storms} nodes, causing them to grant more ward and have shorter cooldowns.
reminderText: Ward is a shield that protects your health. It has no maximum and decays over time.

Mage-80.name: Awe Strike
description: Your melee attacks deal additional lightning damage and you have a chance to parry attacks.

Mage-81.name: River Blade
stats: 15% Increased Cast Speed with Snap Freeze

Mage-82.name: Outrun and Outlast
notScalingStats: 30% Increased Cooldown Recovery Speed for Surge
description: You have additional health and your ward decays more slowly

Mage-84.name: Gemini
description: You can dual wield melee weapons by equipping a sword in your off hand. You take more damage while dual wielding (multiplicative with other modifiers).

Mage-86.name: Arcane Focus
stats: +2 Ward Gain on Direct Spell Cast
reminderText: Ward is a shield that protects your health. It has no maximum and decays over time.

Mage-87.name: Never Late
notScalingStats: Crit Chance bonus Doubled for 30+ Mana Cost
description: After using a traversal skill, your next non-channeled spell has additional spell damage and a higher chance to critically strike.

Mage-89.name: Mental Catalysis
stats: -6% Bonus Damage from Crits with a Catalyst
description: While using a Catalyst you have additional Intelligence and take reduced bonus damage from critical strikes.
reminderText: This effect cannot reduce the damage of a crit below that of a regular hit. It is multiplicative with other damage modifiers, but multiple sources of this stat are additive.

Mage-90.name: Nimbus Walk
stats: 20 Ward Gained on Traversal Skill Use
notScalingStats: Bonuses from Never Late apply to Traversal Skills
description: The spell damage and crit chance from the {Never Late} node now also apply to {Traversal} skills, and you gain ward when you use a {Traversal} skill.
reminderText: Ward is a shield that protects your health. It has no maximum and decays over time.

Mage-91.name: Transcendence
notScalingStats: +24 Additional Ward per Second with 60 Intelligence
reminderText: Ward is a shield that protects your health. It has no maximum and decays over time.

Mage-92.name: Inscribed Instruments
stats: +8% Critical Strike Multiplier with a Wand
description: You have additional critical strike multiplier while using a wand, additional ward retention while using a sceptre, and increased cast speed while using a staff.

Mage-93.name: Decree of the Burning Wind
stats: 1% More Damage to Bosses and Rares
notScalingStats: Doubled effect with Rah Rune or Frost Wall
description: You deal more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers) to Bosses and Rare enemies.

Mage-94.name: Decree of the Eternal Tundra
notScalingStats: Doubled Effect with Heo Rune or Glyph of Dominion
description: You gain ward every 2 seconds.
reminderText: Ward is a shield that protects your health. It has no maximum and decays over time.

Mage-95.name: Brand of Deception
stats: +2% Elemental Penetration with Damage Over Time
description: Your damage over time has additional elemental penetration

Mage-96.name: Jagged Veil
notScalingStats: 1% More Crit Multi per 100 Ward vs Bosses
description:
You gain ward when you critically strike enemies.

This can trigger a maximum of 5 times per second.
reminderText: Ward is a shield that protects your health. It has no maximum and decays over time.

Mage-98.name: Runic Fortress
description: You have additional armor while channeling per active {Rune} from {Runic Invocation}.
reminderText: Ward is a shield that protects your health. It has no maximum and decays over time.

Mage-99.name: Order's Imposition
notScalingStats: +6% Brand of Deception Damage per 1% Shock Chance
description: You deal more damage over time to {Branded} enemies (multiplicative with other modifiers).
reminderText:
Branded enemies are enemies afflicted by Brand of Deception, Brand of Trespass, or Brand of Subjugation.

Your Shock Chance for this scaling does not include more specific Shock Chance stats such "Chance to Shock with Spells".

Mage-100.name: Runeword: Avalanche
stats: 20% Runeword: Avalanche chance on Cold Skill use
notScalingStats: +10 Spell Cold Damage with Runeword: Avalanche
+2 Endurance Threshold per Ignite with Runeword: Avalanche
description:
When you directly use a Cold Skill you have a chance to gain {Runeword: Avalanche}, a buff that grants additional Spell Cold Damage and grants additional Endurance Threshold per stack of Ignite on the attacker.

This buff lasts 6 seconds and does not stack.
reminderText: The additional Endurance Threshold applies to attacks from individual enemies based on how many stacks of Ignite are on that enemy. As an example, if an enemy has 10 stacks of Ignite, you have 20 additional Endurance Threshold against that enemy's attacks.

Mage-101.name: Celestial Doom
notScalingStats: 100 Ward Gain vs Branded Bosses (1 second cooldown)
reminderText: Branded enemies are enemies afflicted by {Brand of Deception, Brand of Trespass, or Brand of Subjugation}.

Mage-102.name: Logocracy
description: {Runeword Buffs} last longer.

Mage-104.name: Runeword: Cataclysm
notScalingStats: +15% Damage vs Low Health with Runeword: Cataclysm
reminderText: Enemies below 35% of max health count as on Low Health.

Mage-105.name: Rune of Dilation
description: After using a {Traversal} skill you gain increased cast speed and movement speed for a short duration. This buff cannot stack.

Mage-106.name: Edict of the Scion
stats: 2 Ward Per Rune On Area Skill Use And Hit
description: Your area skills have increased area, and when you directly use an area skill and hit an enemy you gain ward per active {Rune} from {Runic Invocation}.
reminderText: When casting Runic Invocation itself, the ward is gained before the runes are consumed, as long as the invocation is an area invocation.

Mage-108.name: Decree of the Bountiful Ocean
notScalingStats: Doubled effect with Gon Rune or Runebolt

Mage-109.name: Cerulean Runestones
description: You have additional endurance and maximum mana.

Mage-110.name: Runeword: Inferno
stats: 20% Runeword: Inferno chance on Fire Skill use
notScalingStats: +10 Spell Fire Damage with Runeword: Inferno
+3% Armor per Shock with Runeword: Inferno
description:
When you directly use a Fire Skill you have a chance to gain {Runeword: Inferno}, a buff that grants additional Spell Fire Damage and grants you more Armor per stack of Shock on the Attacker.

This buff lasts 6 seconds and does not stack.
reminderText: The armor bonus is multiplicative with other modifiers, and applies to attacks from individual enemies based on how many stacks of Shock are on that enemy. As an example, if an enemy has 10 stacks of Shock, you have 30% more Armor against that enemy's attacks.

Mage-111.name: Sanguine Runestones
notScalingStats: 15% Health Regen also Applies to Ward

Mage-112.name: Runeword: Hurricane
stats: 20% Runeword: Hurricane chance on Lightning Skill use
notScalingStats: +10 Spell Lightning Damage with Runeword: Hurricane
+90% Freeze Rate Multiplier with Runeword: Hurricane
description:
When you directly use a Lightning Skill you have a chance to gain {Runeword: Hurricane}, a buff that grants additional Spell Lightning Damage and Freeze Rate Multiplier.

This buff lasts 6 seconds and does not stack.

Runemaster.name: Runemaster
stats: 10% increased Cast Speed with Elemental Spells

Sorcerer.name: Sorcerer
stats: Spells deal increased damage equal to their mana cost

Spellblade.name: Spellblade
stats: Mana spent on melee attacks is converted to ward

arcas-2.name: Higher Plane
description: Arcane Ascendance grants you increased spell damage while active.

arcas-3.name: Arcane Absorption
description: While Arcane Ascendance is active, each hit you take increases your spell damage and cast speed, but drains your mana.

arcas-4.name: Power Overload
description: You are granted increased spell damage each second while Arcane Ascendance is active.
reminderText: Expires at the end of Arcane Ascendance.

arcas-5.name: Unstable Energy
description: You are granted increased cast speed each second while Arcane Ascendance is active.

arcas-6.name: Chronoclasm
description: While Arcane Ascendance is active, spells and attacks have a chance to slow enemies over 5 meters away and you deal more damage to enemies per stack of slow on them.
reminderText: The more damage bonus is multiplicative with other modifiers

arcas-7.name: Mana Surge
stats: 6 Mana Gained On Killing Distant Enemy
description: While Arcane Ascendance is active, you are granted mana whenever you kill an enemy that is over 5 meters away.

arcas-8.name: Chains of Ice
description: While Arcane Ascendance is active, whenever you kill a frozen enemy a nearby enemy is frozen for a duration.

arcas-9.name: Power Sprint
description: You are granted {Haste} for a duration after leaving Arcane Ascendance. The duration is capped at 200% of the time you spent in Arcane Ascendance.

arcas-10.name: Arcane Rift
description: You regain mana while you enter Arcane Ascendance, but the mana is lost when you exit Arcane Ascendance.

arcas-11.name: Cosmic Insight
description: Arcane Ascendance has a shorter cooldown.

arcas-12.name: Rebuff
description: You gain ward when you activate Arcane Ascendance.

arcas-14.name: Frozen Monolith
description: While Arcane Ascendance is active, your spells and attacks that can freeze enemies have a higher chance to do so.

arcas-15.name: Force Of Mind
description: You knock back all nearby enemies when you enter Arcane Ascendance.

arcas-16.name: Superconductor
description: While Arcane Ascendance is active, you automatically cast {Lightning Blast} when you hit an enemy. Lightning Blast uses its skill tree and you lose mana equal to Lightning Blast's cost. This effect has a 2 second cooldown.

arcas-17.name: Closed Circuit
description: Lightning Blast cast by {Superconductor} triggers more frequently.

arcas-18.name: Slow Breathing
description: Arcane Ascendance drains less mana per second.

arcas-19.name: Tranquility
description: All of your spells cost less mana while Arcane Ascendance is active, but you cannot regenerate mana while Arcane Ascendance is active.

arcas-21.name: Cold Front
description: While Arcane Ascendance is active, spells and attacks have a chance to chill enemies over 5 meters away.

arcas-22.name: Shocking Expanse
description: While Arcane Ascendance is active, spells and attacks have a chance to shock enemies over 5 meters away.

arcas-23.name: Mark Of Thunder
description: While Arcane Ascendance is active, you {Mark} enemies you hit that are over 5 meters away. When you exit Arcane Ascendance, you consume all marks, dealing lightning damage to affected enemies.
reminderText: Added spell damage applies to this damage at 135% effectiveness.

arcas-24.name: Acuity
description: Arcane Ascendance now has a 2 second cooldown and no longer drains your mana. You can cast 4 spells before Arcane Ascendance ends automatically. Lasts 12 seconds.

arcas-25.name: Cunning
description: You can cast more spells via {Acuity}, but Arcane Ascendance has a longer cooldown.

arcas-26.name: Glyph of Lightning
description: {Mark Of Thunder} deals more damage when it is consumed (multiplicative with other modifiers).

bh2-2.name: Catalyst
description: Black Hole deals more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers), but Black Hole pulls enemies a shorter distance towards itself.

bh2-3.name: Absolute Zero
description: Black Hole has a chance to chill enemies within its area of effect each second.

bh2-4.name: Red Giant
description:
Back Holes base cold damage is converted to fire damage. Consequently this damage scales with increases to fire damage, but not increases to cold damage.

Black Hole lasts much longer, but no longer pulls enemies.

bh2-5.name: Scorching
description: Black Holes damage over time penetrates enemy fire resistance.
reminderText: penetration is more effective against enemies with low health

bh2-6.name: Heat Wave
stats: +2% Ignite Chance Per Second Per 1% Uncapped Fire Res
description: Black Hole has a chance to ignite enemies within its area of effect each second based on your uncapped fire resistance.
reminderText: This scales off of uncapped fire resistance, so gaining more fire resistance above the normal 75% cap will continue to increase its effect. For example at 100% fire resistance, one point in this node grants 200% chance to ignite per second.

bh2-7.name: Flaming
description: Black Hole deals more fire damage (multiplicative with other modifiers).

bh2-8.name: Infusion
description: Black Hole grants you ward each second.

bh2-9.name: Binary System
description:
Black Hole becomes two stars which orbit each other. One deals fire damage and the other deals cold damage. 

Black Hole deals significantly more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers).

bh2-10.name: Umbral Core
description: Black Hole deals more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers).

bh2-11.name: Event Horizon
description: Black Hole deals more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers), but has reduced cast speed.

bh2-12.name: Collapse
description: Black Hole creates an explosion when it ends that pushes all enemies back, but has a shorter duration (multiplicative with other modifiers). The explosion makes a wave of energy that deals 15 cold damage and has a freeze rate of 30.

bh2-13.name: Pulsar
description: Black Hole will {Collapse} each second while it exists.

bh2-14.name: Deep Space
description: The explosions created by the {Collapse} and {Pulsar} nodes have an increased chance to freeze enemies.

bh2-15.name: Time Dilation
description: Black Hole has increased duration and a chance to blind enemies within its area of effect each second.

bh2-16.name: Cascade Fracture
description: Black Hole has a chance to create another Black Hole once it expires.
reminderText: The second Black Hole cannot create another.

bh2-17.name: Rifts
description: Black Hole has a shorter cooldown and costs less mana, but pulls enemies a lesser distance towards itself and pulls enemies within a lesser area (both multiplicative with other modifiers).
reminderText: Modifiers to the pull area do not affect the damage area.

bh2-18.name: Intensity
description: Black Hole pulls enemies a longer distance towards itself.

bh2-19.name: Massive
description: Black Hole pulls enemies within a larger area.

bh2-20.name: Drifting Singularity
description: Black Hole moves toward the nearest enemy that is not within its damaging area.

bh2-21.name: Spacial Dilation
description: Black Hole moves faster toward the nearest enemy.

bh2-22.name: Gravity's Guile
description: Black Holes center hits enemies, dealing spell physical damage.

bh2-23.name: Supermassive
description: Black Hole deals more damage to rare enemies and bosses (multiplicative with other modifiers), and it prioritises moving towards rare enemies and bosses.

bh2-24.name: Stability
description: Black Hole lasts longer.

bh2-25.name: Endless Maw
description: Black Hole lasts longer, but has a longer cooldown.

bh2-26.name: Scattered
description: A second Black Hole is created 10 meters away in a random direction from the first Black Hole.

bh2-27.name: Weakened Reality
description: Black Hole deals more damage to enemies within 1 meter of its center.
reminderText: This effect is multiplicative with other modifiers and does not affect ailments applied by Black Hole.

bh2-28.name: Singularity
description: Black Hole deals significantly more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers), but only 1 Black Hole can be created at a time.

bh2-29.name: Armageddon
description: Black Hole casts {Meteor} every second, but consumes Meteor's mana cost every second.
reminderText: Will only cast Meteor while above 0 mana.

dig5-2.name: Temporal Entrapment
description: Disintegrate has a chance to slow enemies caught within the beam.

dig5-4.name: Catalyst
description: Flame Energy builds up more quickly.

dig5-5.name: Searing Plasma
description: Disintegrate deals more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers).

dig5-6.name: Praesidium
stats: +1 Ward Gained Per 3 Int Per Second
description: You gain ward each second based on your Intelligence while channeling Disintegrate.

dig5-7.name: Cascade
description: Your skills recover their cooldowns faster while you are channeling Disintegrate.

dig5-8.name: Twinbeam
description:
Disintegrate now has two beams, and each beam deals damage independently, so enemies caught in both take double damage.

Disintegrate costs more mana per second to channel, and each beam deals less damage (multiplicative with other modifiers).

dig5-10.name: Stored Power
description: Disintegrate deals significantly more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers), but has a delay before casting. This delay is reduced by increased cast speed.

dig5-11.name: Feedback
description: Disintegrate has a chance to shock enemies caught within the beam.

dig5-12.name: Electrify
description:
Disintegrates base fire damage is converted to lightning. Consequently this damage scales with increases to lightning damage, but not increases to fire damage.

Disintegrate loses the {fire} tag.

dig5-13.name: Laser Focus
description: Disintegrate no longer costs mana while channeling, but it also deals less damage (multiplicative with other modifiers).

dig5-14.name: Hyperfocal
description: Disintegrate deals more lightning damage (multiplicative with other modifiers) based on your maximum mana.

dig5-15.name: Paralyze
description: Shock inflicted by Disintegrate lasts longer and Disintegrate deals more direct damage (multiplicative with other modifiers) per stack of Shock on the target.
reminderText: Direct damage modifiers do not affect damage of ailments or subskills.

dig5-16.name: Tendrils
description:
You have a chance each second to cast {Lightning Blast} at a nearby enemy.

This consumes mana equal to {Lightning Blast's} mana cost.

dig5-17.name: Escalation
description: Disintegrate is upgraded to tier 2 after 2 seconds of channeling. Tier 2 Disintegrate deals more damage, but costs more mana to channel.

dig5-18.name: Amplification
description: Disintegrate is upgraded to tier 3 after 4 seconds of channeling. Tier 3 grants double the bonuses of tier 2.

dig5-19.name: Unbridled Power
description:
While your Disintegrate is at tier 3 you have a chance to inflict {Spreading Flames} and {Spark Charges} on enemies in the beam each second while channeling.

If Disintegrate is converted to {fire}, the {Spark Charges} are converted to {Spreading Flames}.

If Disintegrate is converted to {lightning}, the {Spreading Flames} is converted to {Spark Charges}.

dig5-20.name: Intensify
description: Disintegrate upgrades to the next Tier faster. This also affects the rate at which you gain stacks of {Lucomancer}.

dig5-21.name: Glass Cannon
description: Disintegrate deals more damage while at Tier 2, but also causes you to take more damage while at tier 2 (both multiplicative with other modifiers and each other), and these effects are are doubled at Tier 3.

dig5-22.name: Magnify
stats: 60% Ignite Chance On Hit -> Ignite Chance Per Second
description: Disintegrate gains a portion of your chance to ignite with fire spells on hit as ignite chance per second.

dig5-23.name: Infernal Ray
description:
Disintegrates base lightning damage is converted to fire damage, unless you have the {Electrify} node.

Disintegrate loses the {lightning} tag.

dig5-24.name: Inferno
description: You have a chance each second to cast {Fire Aura} while channeling Disintegrate.

dig5-25.name: Extension
description: Disintegrate has a longer range.

dig5-26.name: Lucomancer
stats: +4% Global Damage to Ignited or Shocked Enemies
description:
For every 2 seconds you spend channeling Disintegrate, you gain a stack of {Lucomancer}, up to 2 stacks and each stack lasts 4 seconds. Stacks are refreshed when you gain a new one.

Lucomancer grants global more damage to ignited or shocked enemies (multiplicative with other modifiers) and global reduced mana cost.

dig5-28.name: Galvanized Defense
description: You take less damage while channeling Disintegrate (multiplicative with other modifiers).

dig5-30.name: Dragon Tongue
description: Disintegrate deals more fire damage (multiplicative with other modifiers) based on your Intelligence.

dig5-32.name: Backfire
description: Flame energy builds up on enemies within the beam, causing an explosion that deals fire damage around them after 3 seconds of taking damage.
reminderText: 3 seconds if the target stays in the beam.

dig5-34.name: Unleashed Power
description:
Every 3 seconds of channelling Disintegrate, you cast {Static Orb} or {Volcanic Orb}, chosen randomly.

If Disintegrate is converted to {fire}, you always cast {Volcanic Orb}.

If Disintegrate is converted to {lightning}, you always cast {Static Orb}.

This consumes mana equal to the mana cost of those respective abilities.

dig5-35.name: Charge Conduit
description: You gain {Static Charges} each second while channeling Disintegrate.

dig5-36.name: Resurgence
stats: Starts At Tier 3 With 2 Stacks Of Lucomancer
description:
If you start channeling Disintegrate while having at least 1 stack of {Lucomancer} it starts at Tier 2.

If you also have the {Amplification} node and at least 2 stacks of {Lucomancer}, Disintegrate starts at Tier 3 instead.

dig5-37.name: Flame Vent
description:
When you stop channeling Disintegrate, you cast {Fireball} at nearby enemies twice per second spent channeling, up to a maximum.

This consumes mana equal to {Fireball's} mana cost.

en6-2.name: Ice Nova
description: Enables {Ice Nova}, which has a freeze rate of 40. Elemental Nova hits deal more (multiplicative with other modifiers) damage.

en6-3.name: Glyphs of Winter
description: Elemental Nova has a chance to chill enemies and an increased chance to freeze enemies.

en6-4.name: Freezing Cascade
description: Elemental Nova casts {Freezing Cascade} on hit, creating a cascade of freezing novas that chain between enemies.

en6-5.name: Glacial Might
description: Elemental Nova deals more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers), but Elemental Nova costs more mana.

en6-6.name: Protective Strikes
description: Elemental Nova hits have a chance to grant ward.

en6-7.name: Magical Barrier
description: The {Protective Strikes} and {Survival of the Victor} nodes on this tree grant more ward.

en6-8.name: Lightning Nova
description: Enables {Lightning Nova}, which has +1% critical strike chance compared to other Elemental Nova types. Elemental Nova hits deal more (multiplicative with other modifiers) damage.

en6-9.name: Charged Destruction
description: Elemental Nova hits have an increased critical strike chance.

en6-10.name: Survival of the Victor
description: Elemental Nova kills have a chance to grant ward.

en6-11.name: Arcane Protection
description: You have more ward retention for 4 seconds after killing an enemy with Elemental Nova. You may have only one instance of this buff at once.

en6-12.name: Fire Nova
description: Enables {Fire Nova}, which deals 8% more hit damage than other Elemental Nova types. All Elemental Nova hits deal more (multiplicative with other modifiers) damage.

en6-13.name: Infernal Prism
description: Elemental Nova hits penetrate enemy elemental resistances.

en6-14.name: Ash Frenzy
stats: +5% Hit Damage To High Health Enemies
description: Elemental Nova hits deal more damage against enemies that are at high health (multiplicative with other modifiers). Elemental Nova has increased cast speed.

en6-15.name: Arcane Projection
description: Elemental Nova is now cast at a target location instead of around you.

en6-16.name: Infernal Nova
description: Elemental Nova has a significantly larger area of effect when directly cast, and ignites caused by Elemental Nova have increased duration, but Elemental Nova has a 4 second cooldown. The area of effect increase is smaller if Elemental Nova is channeled.

en6-17.name: Conflagrating Speed
description: Elemental Nova has a shorter cooldown.

en6-18.name: Spark Charges
description:
Elemental Nova hits have a chance to attach a {Spark Charge}, which deals lightning damage to nearby enemies after 1 second or when the enemy dies.

Additionally, Elemental Nova deals more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers).

en6-19.name: Immolation
description: Elemental Nova hits have a chance to Ignite enemies.
reminderText: Applies to fire nova, ice nova, lightning nova, and elemental nova.

en6-20.name: Flame Battery
description: You can store an additional charge of Elemental Nova.

en6-21.name: Elemental Expanse
description: Elemental Nova has a larger area of effect.

en6-22.name: Overcharge
description: Elemental Novas have a chance to be {Overcharged}. Overcharged Novas shock enemies and have a larger area of effect.

en6-23.name: Overload
description: {Overcharged} Elemental Novas deal more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers) and have increased stun chance.

en6-24.name: Elemental Tranquillity
description:
{Ice Nova} has a higher chance to Freeze enemies.

{Lightning Nova} has a chance to Shock enemies.

{Fire Nova} has a chance to Ignite enemies.

en6-25.name: Cryomantic Fragility
description: Elemental Nova costs less mana, but you take increased cold damage if you have cast Elemental Nova recently (past 4 seconds).

en6-26.name: Arcana Elementorum
description: Elemental Nova deals more elemental damage (multiplicative with other modifiers) and has a slightly larger area of effect. These effects are doubled when it is directly cast.

en6-27.name: Melting Nova
description: Elemental Nova has a chance to shred armour on hit and has increased critical strike chance.
reminderText: Armour Shred reduces armour by 100, lasts 4 seconds, and can stack.

en6-28.name: Luminaire
description: Elemental Nova becomes a channeled ability, unleashing 5 novas per second, and rapidly draining your mana. Elemental Nova has a smaller area of effect (multiplicative with other area modifiers).
reminderText: Cast speed only affects how quickly you start channelling.

en6-29.name: Star Prism
description: Elemental Nova costs less mana per second to channel

en6-30.name: Silenced Spark
description:
You have additional lightning resistance while channeling, but Lightning Nova is disabled.

If you have not taken the {Fire Nova} or {Ice Nova} nodes, then this node re-enables basic Elemental Nova.

en6-32.name: Shatter Nova
description: Elemental Nova hits deal more damage against chilled enemies, frozen enemies, shocked enemies, and ignited enemies (multiplicative with other modifiers).

en6-34.name: Fiery Destruction
description: Elemental Nova critical strikes deal more damage.

f1b4d-0.name: Firebrand
description: A melee attack which grants you a stack of firebrand buff if it hits an enemy. Firebrand buff increases the size of subsequent firebrand attacks and adds melee fire damage.

f1b4d-1.name: Searing Brand
description: Firebrand deals more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers).

f1b4d-2.name: Charring
description: Firebrand deals more melee damage per stack of Firebrand (multiplicative with other modifiers).

f1b4d-3.name: Triple Strike
description: Firebrand now shoots three lines instead of one in a cone in front of you, but costs more mana.

f1b4d-4.name: Hypothermia
description: Using {Shatter Strike} consumes stacks of Firebrand to gain {Frostbite} Chance per stack consumed.

f1b4d-5.name: Kindling
stats: 10% Increased Melee Crit Chance Per Stack
description: Firebrand has increased melee critical strike chance per stack of Firebrand.

f1b4d-6.name: Inflame
description: Firebrand has additional melee critical strike multiplier per stack of Firebrand.

f1b4d-7.name: Incineration
description: Your next melee attack, that is not Firebrand, consumes all stacks of Firebrand and deals more damage per stack consumed (multiplicative with other modifiers).

f1b4d-8.name: Illuminating Fire
description: Consuming stacks of Firebrand with {Incineration} grants bonus critical strike chance and critical strike multiplier per stack.

f1b4d-9.name: Wildfire
description: Firebrand can have more maximum stacks.

f1b4d-10.name: Insulation
description: Firebrand grants additional armor and fire resistance per stack of Firebrand.

f1b4d-11.name: Galvanize
description:
Firebrands's base fire damage and added melee fire damage from stacks is converted to lightning. Consequently this damage scales with increases to lightning damage, but not increases to fire damage.

All ignite chance from this tree is converted to shock chance and effects related to ignite now depend on shock instead.

Swaps Firebrand's {Fire} tag for a {Lightning} tag.

f1b4d-12.name: Mana Shell
description: Gain ward per stack of Firebrand when you hit at least 1 enemy with {Mana Strike}.

f1b4d-13.name: Electrostatic
description: Gain stacks of {Static} if Firebrand hits at least one enemy.

f1b4d-14.name: Pyroshielding
description: You gain ward when Firebrand hits at least one enemy.

f1b4d-15.name: Warding Flames
description: You gain ward per second per stack of Firebrand.

f1b4d-16.name: Undying Fire
description: Stacks of Firebrand last longer.

f1b4d-17.name: Everflames
description: You refresh the duration of all stacks of Firebrand when gaining a new stack.

f1b4d-18.name: Ardent Branding
description:
Firebrand can have more maximum stacks and deals more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers), but no longer scales with attack speed. 

Firebrand can still gain attack speed from the {Fulmination} node.
reminderText: Also prevents the base attack rate of weapons from affecting Firebrand.

f1b4d-19.name: Fulmination
description: Firebrand attacks faster per stack of Firebrand, up to a maximum.
reminderText: Attack speed bonus applies even if you have the {Ardent Branding} node.

f1b4d-20.name: Brand of Arcanus
description: Stacks of Firebrand add spell damage rather than melee fire damage.

f1b4d-21.name: Arcane Sharpshooter
description: Firebrand grants global spell critical strike multiplier per stack of Firebrand.

f1b4d-22.name: Pyre
description: If Firebrand hits at least one enemy, it consumes 6 mana to cast {Flame Wave}, a spell that deals fire damage in a line.

f1b4d-23.name: Flare
description: Firebrand has a chance to ignite enemies.

f1b4d-24.name: Inferno
stats: +2% More Fire Damage Per Stack vs Spreading Flames
description:
Firebrand has a chance to inflict {Spreading Flames} when hitting an ignited enemy.

Stacks of Firebrand also grant more fire damage (multiplicative with other modifiers) against enemies afflicted by Spreading Flames.
reminderText: The more fire damage effect of each stack of Firebrand is also multiplicative with the effect from the other stacks.

f1b4d-25.name: Crossfire
description: Each stack of Firebrand grants you global Ignite Chance.

f1b4d-26.name: Exothermic
description: Using {Flame Reave} consumes stacks of Firebrand to gain {Ignite} Chance per stack consumed.

f1b4d-27.name: Conflagrate
description: You gain an additional stack of Firebrand when attacking, but Firebrand costs more mana.

f1b4d-28.name: Fading Flame
stats: 15 Ward Per Stack Consumed or Expired
description: You gain ward when a stack of Firebrand expires or is consumed.
reminderText: This does not grant you ward if an extra stack above your maximum would cause an old stack to be replaced.

fb8fe-1.name: Arcanist
description: Runebolt has increased cast speed and it has a chance to grant you the {Haste} buff for a short duration.

fb8fe-2.name: Cryomantic Bolt
description: Runebolt deals more cold damage (multiplicative with other modifiers).

fb8fe-3.name: Frost Spikes
description:
The {Lightning Bolt's} base lightning damage is converted to cold. Consequently this damage scales with increases to cold damage, but not increases to lightning damage.

Shock chance from all sources is converted to {Chill} for Runebolt and effects related to shock now depend on chill instead.

Swaps the {Lightning Bolt's} {Lightning} tag for a {Cold} tag.

fb8fe-4.name: Ice Shard
description:
The {Fire Bolt's} base fire damage is converted to cold. Consequently this damage scales with increases to cold damage, but not increases to fire damage.

Ignite chance from all sources is converted to {Chill} for Runebolt and effects related to ignite now depend on chill instead.

Swaps the {Fire Bolt's} {Fire} tag for a {Cold} tag.

fb8fe-5.name: Fulminating Bolt
description: Runebolt deals more lightning damage (multiplicative with other modifiers).

fb8fe-6.name: Lightning Spear
description:
The {Cold Bolt's} base cold damage is converted to lightning. Consequently this damage scales with increases to lightning damage, but not increases to cold damage.

Chill chance from all sources is converted to {Shock} for Runebolt and effects related to chill now depend on shock instead.

Swaps the {Cold Bolt's} {Cold} tag for a {Lightning} tag.

fb8fe-7.name: Jolting Spark
description:
The {Fire Bolt's} base fire damage is converted to lightning. Consequently this damage scales with increases to lightning damage, but not increases to fire damage.

Ignite chance from all sources is converted to {Shock} for Runebolt and effects related to ignite now depend on shock instead.

Swaps the {Fire Bolt's} {Fire} tag for a {Lightning} tag.

fb8fe-8.name: Pyromantic Bolt
description: Runebolt deals more fire damage (multiplicative with other modifiers).

fb8fe-9.name: Blazing Flare
description:
The {Lightning Bolt's} base lightning damage is converted to fire. Consequently this damage scales with increases to fire damage, but not increases to lightning damage.

Shock chance from all sources is converted to ignite for Runebolt and effects related to shock now depend on ignite instead.

Swaps the {Lightning Bolt's} {Lightning} tag for a {Fire} tag.

fb8fe-10.name: Searing Dart
description:
The {Cold Bolt's} base cold damage is converted to fire. Consequently this damage scales with increases to fire damage, but not increases to cold damage.

{Frostbite} chance from all sources is converted to ignite for Runebolt and effects related to {Frostbite} now depend on ignite instead.

Swaps the {Cold Bolt's} {Cold} tag for a {Fire} tag.

fb8fe-11.name: Efficient Experiment
stats: 1% Chance to Double Cast Per 5 Glyph of Chaos
description:
Runebolt now randomly selects the element with each cast rather than by combo order. 

Directly casting Rune Bolt now has a chance to double cast if the previous cast was a different type. The chance is based on the amount of {Glyph of Chaos} you have in your crafting inventory.

fb8fe-12.name: Arcane Overcharge
description: Runebolt has a chance to shoot additional projectiles in a volley in front of you.

fb8fe-13.name: Supercharged Bolt
description: Runebolt's chance to shoot extra projectiles from the {Arcane Overcharge} node and the amount of projectiles are doubled while standing in a {Glyph of Dominion}.
reminderText: Chance above 100% to shoot additional projectiles doesn't have any effect.

fb8fe-14.name: Runic Evocation
description: Runebolt now shoots in a cone and the projectiles seek out enemies.

fb8fe-15.name: Attuned Recovery
description: Directly casting Runebolt and hitting at least one enemy grants you health if it was a {Fire Bolt}, ward if it was a {Lightning Bolt} and mana if it was a {Cold Bolt}.

fb8fe-16.name: Amplified Cascade
description:
If your last three direct casts were all Runebolt, then any further cast of it becomes tri-elemental (fire, lightning and cold). Tri-elemental Runebolt deals more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers) and applies all the effects of the {Attuned Recovery} node.

Once you directly cast another skill, Runebolt loses all of these effects.

fb8fe-17.name: Inscription of Momentum
description: When Runebolt passes through a {Frost Wall} it is intensified dealing more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers) and gains increased projectile speed.

fb8fe-18.name: Punch Through Metal
description: Runebolt hits have a chance to shred enemy armor.

fb8fe-19.name: Kinetic Breach
stats: +1 Physical Spell Damage per Strength from Nearby Ally
description: Runebolt deals additional physical damage per point of strength of you or your nearby ally with the highest amount of strength.

fb8fe-20.name: Runestone
stats: Runestone On Cast Instead Of Runebolt
description:
Directly casting Runebolt now creates a {Runestone} in front of you if you do not currently have one nearby instead of casting a Runebolt. If you have a nearby {Runestone}, directly using Runebolt now casts two bolts from the {Runestone} towards the target.  

After several seconds {Runestone} consumes mana to explode.
reminderText: {Runestone} does not count as a minion.

fb8fe-21.name: Awakened Runestone
description: Every second while channeling a skill, your nearest {Runestone} has a chance to cast Runebolt towards your target.

fb8fe-22.name: Devastator
description: Runebolt now explodes when it reaches its target location or when hitting enemies or obstacles, dealing damage of the corresponding element in an area.

fb8fe-23.name: Wrecking Ball
description: The explosion from {Devastator} deals damage in a larger area per uncapped resistance of the corresponding element.

fb8fe-24.name: Arcane Restoration
description: Directly casting Runebolt and hitting at least one enemy has a chance to grant you mana.

fb8fe-25.name: Runeweaver
notScalingStats: 40% Mana Spent Gained As Ward per stack
description: Casting Runebolt and hitting at least one enemy grants you a stack of {Runeweave} up to a maximum.

fb8fe-26.name: Dissolve and Conquer
stats: +0.5% Elemental Damage per stack of Armor Shred
7% Maximum Damage Boost per stack of Runeweave
description: Each stack of {Runeweave} also grants you more elemental damage (multiplicative with other modifiers) per stack of armor shred on the target up to a maximum.

fb8fe-27.name: Cosmic Tapestry
stats: +1% Runic Invocation Crit Chance per stack
description: Each stack of {Runeweave} also grants your {Runic Invocation} additional critical strike chance.

fb8fe-28.name: Orderly Conduit
description:
Runebolt gains additional effects for each unique {Rune} you have. Multiple {Runes} of the same type does not stack the effect.

{Rah Rune}: Runebolt has a chance to ignite enemies.
{Gon Rune}: Runebolt has a chance to shock enemies.
{Heo Rune}: Runebolt has a chance to inflict {Frostbite} on enemies.

fb8fe-29.name: Torrent of Evocation
stats: Reverses order of Rune Bolt Combo
description: Runebolt's combo is now cast in a reversed order.

fb8fe-30.name: Focused Runewords
stats: Runic Invocation Runes Randomization on Cast
description: Casting Runebolt now randomizes the runes of your {Runic Invocation}.
reminderText: This randomizes the element, number and order of {Runic Invocation}.

fb8fe-31.name: Echomancy
stats: Rune Bolt Sequence as Recent Runic Invocation
description: Runebolt is now cast in a sequence with the same order of your most recent {Runic Invocation}

fb8fe-32.name: Imbued Runestone
description:
If you have 3 {Runes} from {Runic Invocation} when you create a {Runestone}, the {Runes} are consumed to instead create an {Imbued Runestone} that fires three bolts. An {Imbued Runestone's} explosion has 100% more area of effect and damage.

This effect has a 20 second cooldown. When you cast {Runic Invocation} the remaining cooldown is reduced by 20% per {Rune} in the {Invocation}.

fi9-2.name: Piercing Heat
description: Fireball now pierces enemies (continue through targets it hits), but costs more mana.

fi9-3.name: Immolated Core
description: Fireball hits have additional fire penetration and lightning penetration.

fi9-4.name: Orb of Destruction
description: Improves Fireball's base critical strike chance.

fi9-5.name: Plasma Ball
description:
Half of Fireball's base fire damage is converted to lightning. Consequently this portion of its damage scales with increases to lightning damage, but not increases to fire damage.

Fireball gains a {Lightning} tag.

Fireball also gains additional critical strike multiplier.

fi9-6.name: Winged Fire
description: Fireball deals more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers) and travels faster, causing it to travel farther.

fi9-7.name: Fire Spray
description: Fireball releases additional projectiles that fire in a cone when cast, but costs more mana.
reminderText: Projectiles are fired all at once in a cone

fi9-8.name: Skira's Gambit
description: Improves Fireball's base critical strike chance, but reduces its cast speed (multiplicative with other modifiers).

fi9-9.name: Arcane Divergence
description: Fireball releases additional projectiles that fire in a cone when cast, but costs more mana.

fi9-10.name: Igneous Force
description: Nodes on this tree that add crit chance instead increase stun chance by 20 times the stated value.

fi9-11.name: Embers
stats: Projectiles Can Hit The Same Target
description: Fireballs fire in sequence in the same direction and can now hit the same target, but Fireball releases fewer projectiles and has less cast speed for each extra projectile (multiplicative with other modifiers).
reminderText: This node enables the extra projectiles to hit the same enemy

fi9-12.name: Dancing Fire
description: Fireball releases additional projectiles. These additional projectiles are NOT reduced by the extra projectiles penalty via the {Embers} node.
reminderText: Not affected by Embers' penalty to the number of extra projectiles

fi9-13.name: Conflagration
description: Fireball hits have a higher chance to ignite enemies.

fi9-14.name: Spreading Inferno
description:
Fireball hits have a chance to apply {Spreading Flames}, an ailment which deals fire damage over time and spreads to nearby enemies.

Additionally all damage over time ailments applied by Fireball deal more damage (multiplicative with other modifier).

fi9-15.name: Wildfire
description: {Spreading Flames} applied by fireball has additional fire penetration

fi9-16.name: Burning Wounds
stats: 25% More Crit Chance Against Ignited Enemies
description: Fireball hits have more critical strike chance against ignited enemies (multiplicative with other modifiers).

fi9-17.name: Adept
description: Fireball has increased cast speed.

fi9-18.name: Flammability
description: Fireball hits have a chance to reduce enemy fire resistance.
reminderText: This effect grants an equal amount of lightning resistance shred chance if Fireball has been converted to lightning.

fi9-19.name: Seeker's Ash
description: Fireballs now seek nearby targets.

fi9-20.name: Flame Burst
description: Hitting the same enemy with several fireballs triggers a {Flame Burst} around them.
reminderText: {Flame Burst} is a fire spell that deals high damage in an area.

fi9-21.name: Volatile flames
description: Flame Burst requires fewer hits with Fireball to trigger.
reminderText: {Flame Burst} is a fire spell that deals high damage in an area.

fi9-22.name: Mana Sphere
description: Fireball deals more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers) and costs less mana.

fi9-23.name: Unchained Fire
description: Fireball has increased cast speed and deals more damage for each extra projectile (multiplicative with other modifiers), but no longer fires extra projectiles.

fi9-24.name: Flamethrower
description: Fireball becomes a channelled ability that rapidly spews fireballs from your hand, but rapidly drains your mana. You do not regenerate mana while channelling.
reminderText: Increased cast speed affects how quickly you start channelling, but does not affect the number of fireballs per second.

fi9-25.name: Forbidden Flames
description: Fireballs have a chance to pierce enemies (continue through targets it hits), but {Flamethrower} costs more mana per second to channel.

fi9-26.name: Eternal Fire
description: {Flamethrower} costs less mana per second to channel.
reminderText: This is additive with the channel cost modifier from the {Ghostfire} node.

fi9-27.name: Magma Shell
description: You have additional Armor and Fire Resistance while channeling Fireball's {Flamethrower}.

fi9-28.name: Infernal Legacy
description: Fireballs last longer, causing them to travel further.

fl71ds-2.name: Blazing Flux
notScalingStats: Double Effects With 150% Uncapped Fire Res
description: Flame Rush costs less mana and has a shorter cooldown. These effects are doubled if you have enough uncapped fire resistance.

fl71ds-3.name: Manafused Current
description: Flame Rush deals more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers) per 40 current mana.

fl71ds-4.name: Glyph of Intention
stats: Glyph of Dominion At Target Location
description:
Flame Rush now casts {Glyph of Dominion} at the target location instead of channeling and Flame Rush ends when reaching the Glyph.

This effect consumes mana equal to a portion of {Glyph of Dominion's} mana cost.
reminderText: You will always reach your target after 1.5 seconds, but modifiers to travel speed affect the maximum possible distance.

fl71ds-5.name: Magma Starter
description:
Flame Rush now casts {Volcanic Orb} that is attached to you and only detonates when you end Flame Rush, alongside any other active {Volcanic Orbs}.

This effect consumes mana equal to a portion of {Volcanic Orb's} mana cost.

fl71ds-6.name: Runic Eclipse
description:
You take less damage (multiplicative with other modifiers) during Flame Rush.

This effect is doubled against damage over time effects.

fl71ds-7.name: Celestial Guidance
stats: 15% Buff Duration Equal To Time In Flame Rush
description: All buff effects from the Flame Rush tree persist afterwards for a portion of the time equal to the duration you spent in Flame Rush.
reminderText: This includes effects like ward per second and the less damage taken during Flame Rush effect from the base skill.

fl71ds-8.name: Lunar Protection
description: You gain ward per second during Flame Rush and you gain a burst of ward when Flame Rush ends.

fl71ds-9.name: Energy Equivalence
description:
{Flame Rush's} base fire damage is converted to lightning. Consequently this damage scales with increases to lightning damage, but not increases to fire damage.

{Fire Resistance Shred} chance from all sources is converted to {Lightning Resistance Shred} for Flame Rush and effects related to Fire Shred now depend on Lightning Shred instead.

Swaps {Flame Rush's} {Fire} tag for a {Lightning} tag.

fl71ds-10.name: Beta Decay
description:
Flame Rush now also casts a {Static Orb} in the opposite direction.

This effect consumes mana equal to a portion of {Static Orb's} mana cost.

fl71ds-11.name: Snowballing
description:
{Flame Rush's} base lightning damage is converted to cold. Consequently this damage scales with increases to cold damage, but not increases to lightning damage.

{Lightning Resistance Shred} chance from all sources is converted to {Cold Resistance Shred} for Flame Rush and effects related to Lightning Shred now depend on Cold Shred instead.

Swaps {Flame Rush's} {Lightning} tag for a {Cold} tag.

fl71ds-13.name: Branding Cold
stats: Brand of Subjugation On Pass Through
+2% Brand of Subjugation Damage Per 1% Chill Chance
description: Flame Rush now inflicts {Brand of Subjugation} to enemies you pass through. The Brand does not stack but deals a large amount of cold damage over time and it deals more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers) per your chance to chill.

fl71ds-14.name: Fiery Overload
description: You are granted the {Frenzy} buff for a short duration when you end Flame Rush.

fl71ds-15.name: Epilogue
description:
You cast {Runic Invocation} when you exit Flame Rush, if you have it on your action bar.

This effect consumes mana equal to a percentage of {Runic Invocation's} mana cost.

fl71ds-16.name: Guidance of Flames
stats: Flame Rush Buff In Fireball Direction
description: Casting {Fireball} and then using Flame Rush in the same direction within 2 seconds causes that Flame Rush to deal more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers) in a larger area and grants you mana on cast.

fl71ds-17.name: Breath of Fire
stats: Runic Burst On Fireball During Rush
description: Whenever you hit an enemy with {Fireball} during Flame Rush it causes a {Runic Burst} around the target.
reminderText: This can trigger at most once every 0.2 seconds.

fl71ds-18.name: Smolder and Burn
stats: +1 Fire Shred Stacks On Pass Through
description: Flame Rush now applies {Fire Resistance Shred} on enemies it passes through.
reminderText: This effect does not apply to the explosion.

fl71ds-19.name: Fire Eater
stats: +24 Ignited Enemy Ward Gain On Pass Through
+12 Ward Gain Per Ignite On Pass Through
description:
Whenever you pass through an ignited enemy you gain ward and consume all your ignite stacks on that enemy. 

Consuming your ignite stacks this way grants you ward per your ignite stack on them, but they don't deal their remaining damage.

fl71ds-20.name: Mark of the Forbidden Flame
stats: 1% % Of Current Health Consumed Per Ignite Without Ward
description:
Whenever you pass through an ignited enemy with Flame Rush, instead of gaining ward per stack of ignite on the enemy and consuming your ignite stacks without dealing damage, you lose 12 ward per stack of ignite and the ignite stacks instantly deal their remaining damage on the enemy.

If you do not have enough ward for this effect, a percentage of your remaining health is consumed instead, up to a maximum. Ignite stacks consumed this way deal more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers) per point of intelligence.
reminderText: This effect takes into account ignite stacks inflicted by Flame Rush itself.

fl71ds-21.name: Solar Rush
description: You travel faster and further with Flame Rush.

fl71ds-22.name: Blazeborn
description: Flame Rush deals more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers) in a larger area.

fl71ds-23.name: Gas Powered
description: Whenever you pass through a {Frost Wall} during Flame Rush it causes the explosion to deal damage in a much larger area and its chance to critically hit is doubled.

fl71ds-24.name: Ember Wake
stats: Fire Rune Embers While Not In Flame Rush
description: Every 0.4 seconds during Flame Rush you create a {Rune Ember}, up to a maximum. Every 0.25 seconds while not in Flame Rush you fire a {Rune Ember} at a nearby enemy if you have any.

fl71ds-25.name: Flaring Coals
description: {Rune Embers} deal more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers).

fl71ds-26.name: Living Embers
description: Casting Flame Rush creates additional {Rune Embers}.

fl71ds-27.name: Keen Ignition
description: {Rune Embers} now pierce enemies.

fl71ds-28.name: Signet of Ash
stats: +25% Rune Ember Frequency During Flame Rush
description: You now have a chance to create a {Rune Ember} on kill during Flame Rush and you create {Rune Embers} faster during Flame Rush.

fr4wl-1.name: Biting Limit
description: Frost Wall has a chance to inflict a stack of Frostbite to enemies inside the wall every 0.25 seconds.

fr4wl-2.name: Lightning Rod
description:
One of Frost Wall's {Pillars} now casts {Lightning Blast} at nearby enemies when you first pass through the wall.

This effect consumes mana equal to {Lightning Blast's} mana cost.
reminderText: This requires you to be at positive mana when cast.

fr4wl-3.name: Charged Pylons
description:
Frost Wall's outer {Pillars} cast {Lightning Blast} at nearby enemies every other second.

This effect consumes mana equal to {Lightning Blast's} mana cost.

fr4wl-4.name: Amplified Currents
description: After Frost Wall has existed for a short duration, its outer {Pillars} cast {Lightning Blast} more often, up to a maximum, every time an enemy passes through the wall.

fr4wl-5.name: Aspirant's Arrival
description:
After you pass through your Frost Wall your next {Runic Invocation} or {Glyph of Dominion} cast within 5 seconds is empowered. 

An empowered spell cast this way, costs less mana (multiplicative with other modifiers) and it also deals more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers) for each second the wall has existed, before you walk through it.

fr4wl-6.name: Purifying Gate
stats: Cleanses Negative Ailments On Pass Through
description: Frost Wall now cleanses negative ailments on you and your allies when they first pass through the wall.

fr4wl-7.name: Arch of Rimefrost
description: Frost Wall deals more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers) and has a higher chance to freeze enemies.

fr4wl-8.name: Crystals of Protection
description:
Frost Wall now grants you and your allies ward and mana when they first pass through the wall.

These effects are doubled if the wall is placed at least 2 meters away from you.

fr4wl-9.name: Boosted Kickoff
description:
Frost Wall now grants the {Haste} and {Frenzy} buffs for a short duration, up to a maximum, when you and your allies when they first pass through the wall.

The maximum duration is equal to Frost Wall's age plus 1 second.

fr4wl-10.name: Runic Conclusion
description: Frost Wall now creates three {Runic Detonations} shortly after you pass through it, dealing spell cold damage to nearby enemies.
reminderText:
This effect doesn't destroy the wall.

{Runic Detonations} can be converted to fire with the {Pyroglass} node and to lightning with the {Crackling Barrier} node.

An enemy can be hit by multiple detonations at once.

fr4wl-11.name: Shattered to Pieces
description: The {Runic Detonations} from {Runic Conclusion} intensify, destroying the wall in the process and deals more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers) in a larger area.

fr4wl-12.name: Glyph of Direfrost
description: The {Runic Detonations} deal more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers) in a larger area if you are facing away from the wall when the detonations occur.

fr4wl-13.name: Prepared Wards
stats: Flame Ward On Ally Pass Through
description:
You now cast Flame Ward on you or your allies (excluding their minions) that pass through your Frost Wall, if it has existed for at least 0.2 seconds.

Frost Wall now has a cooldown, which it shares with Flame Ward. Using one will put the other on cooldown.

fr4wl-14.name: Heaping Cold
description: If you haven't cast Frost Wall in the past 15 seconds, it has no mana cost and deals more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers).

fr4wl-15.name: Marching Winter
description: Frost Wall is larger and lasts longer.

fr4wl-16.name: Chilled Touch
description: You deal more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers) to chilled enemies while you have an active Frost Wall.

fr4wl-17.name: The Dark Cold
stats: +3% Damage Over Time Per Second Of Existence
description:
Frost Wall deals more damage over time (multiplicative with other modifiers) per second the wall has existed.

This does not affect ailments or subskills.

fr4wl-18.name: Howling Rift
description: When you cast Frost Wall while having an existing wall active with more than half its duration remaining, the existing wall is moved to the new target location instead of being replaced and you gain mana equal to half the Frost Walls mana cost.
reminderText: This allows it to hit the same enemies or allies an additional time.

fr4wl-19.name: Frigid Domination
stats: +1 Spell Damage Per 20% Freeze Rate Multiplier
description: Frost Wall deals additional spell damage equal to a portion of your freeze rate multiplier.

fr4wl-20.name: Frozen Throne
description:
Frost Wall's initial freeze has increased duration, and the wall deals more damage over time to frozen enemies (multiplicative with other modifiers).

This does not affect ailments or subskills.

fr4wl-21.name: Protection of the Apostate
stats: 5 Ward Gain On Enemy Pass Through
description: You are granted ward whenever enemies pass through the wall for the first time.

fr4wl-22.name: Shelter of the Chef
description: Whenever an enemy passes through the wall for the first time, and after it has existed for 0.2 seconds, you gain ward equal to a small portion of the enemy's maximum health, up to a maximum amount of ward per enemy.

fr4wl-23.name: Pyroglass
description:
{Frost Wall's} base cold damage is converted to fire. Consequently this damage scales with increases to fire damage, but not increases to cold damage.

For Frost Wall, chill chance from all sources is converted to {Ignite}, and Frostbite chance from all sources is converted to {Fire Resistance Shred}.

Swaps {Frost Wall's} {Cold} tag for a {Fire} tag.

fr4wl-24.name: Brand the Invaders
stats: Brand of Trespass On Enemy Pass Through
description:
Frost Wall now inflicts Brand of Trespass to enemies inside the wall. This Brand does not stack, but deals a large amount of fire damage over time.

Brand of Trespass deals more damage equal to your ignite chance.

fr4wl-25.name: Flames Unchained
stats: 15% Fireball Chance On Enemy Pass Through
description:
Whenever an enemy passes through your Frost Wall, you have a chance to cast {Fireball} towards them.

This effect consumes mana equal to {Fireball's} mana cost.

fr4wl-26.name: Crackling Barrier
description:
{Frost Wall's} base cold damage is converted to lightning. Consequently this damage scales with increases to lightning damage, but not increases to cold damage.

For Frost Wall, chill chance from all sources is converted to {Slow}, and Frostbite chance from all sources is converted to {Shock}.

Swaps Frost Wall's {Cold} tag for a {Lightning} tag.
reminderText: This node has no effect if Frost Wall is converted to Fire.

fr4wl-27.name: Wall of Glyptic Art
description:
Frost Wall now casts {Runebolt} in the original target direction the Wall was cast. The element of the bolts match the element of the Wall, regardless of {Runebolt's} tree.

This effect consumes 2 mana per projectile and does not cast if you are at negative mana.

fr4wl-28.name: Arcane Mosaic
description: Frost Wall casts {Runebolt} more often.

fr11mv-2.name: Dancing Flames
description: Flame Reave has increased attack speed and costs less mana, but travels more slowly, reducing its range.

fr11mv-3.name: Rhythm of Fire
description: Using Flame Reave grants 4 stacks of {Rhymth of Fire}. If you already have 12 stacks, Flame Reave instead consumes all the stacks to gain greatly increased width, range, and damage (multiplicative with other modifiers).
reminderText:
If you have the {Worldfire} node the damage and range increases apply as normal, but the width increase has no effect.

The use of Flame Reave that consumes the stacks does not generate any stacks itself. This results in stacks being consumed every 4 uses of Flame Reave by default.

fr11mv-4.name: Versatility
description:
Directly using Surge, Fireball, Mana Strike, or Firebrand also grants stacks of {Rhythm of Fire}.

These skills cannot consume stacks of {Rhythm of Fire} and you cannot exceed the number of stacks required for Flame Reave to consume stacks, which is 12 by default.

fr11mv-5.name: Engulfing Flames
description:
Flame Reave hits have a chance to apply {Spreading Flames}.

Flame Reave deals more fire damage over time (multiplicative with other modifiers).

fr11mv-6.name: Frenzied Flame
stats: +8 Flame Reave Fire Damage during Frenzy
description:
Flame Reave hits have a chance to grant you {Frenzy} for 3 seconds.

In addition to Frenzy's base effect it now grants Flame Reave additional melee fire damage.

fr11mv-7.name: Naurcrist
description: Flame Reave hits deal additional melee fire damage per equipped sword.

fr11mv-8.name: Rolling Thunder
stats: Fire Damage modiifers on tree also apply to Lightning Damage
Ignite Chance from tree also grants Shock Chance
description:
Half of Flame Reave's base damage is converted to lightning, meaning that this half of the damage scales with increases to lightning damage but not with increases to fire damage.

Fire damage bonuses from this tree now also apply to Lightning.

Ignite chance from this tree now also grants an equal amount of shock chance.

Flame Reave gains a {Lightning} tag.

fr11mv-9.name: Heat Wave
description: Flame Reave deals more fire damage (multiplicative with other modifiers)

fr11mv-10.name: Scorched Earth
description: Enemies killed by Flame Reave have a chance to explode, dealing damage to nearby enemies.
reminderText: Explosions scale with fire damage and spell damage. They are affected by applicable stats granted by nodes on this tree, such as ignite chance and crit chance.

fr11mv-11.name: Volatile Strike
description: Explosions from the {Scorched Earth} node are larger and deal more hit damage (multiplicative with other modifiers).

fr11mv-12.name: Arcane Severance
description: Flame Reave deals more melee damage (multiplicative with other modifiers) and it deals added melee damage based on your added spell damage.
reminderText: All types of added spell damage, such as added spell fire damage and added spell void damage, count and will be added as the corresponding type of melee damage.

fr11mv-13.name: Ember Infusion
description: Flame Reave deals more melee damage (multiplicative with other modifiers).

fr11mv-14.name: Catalyst of Ash
description:
When you hit an enemy with Flame Reave you have a chance to cast {Fireball} towards the enemy hit.

Fireballs cast this way cannot have extra projectiles.

fr11mv-16.name: Firewalker
description: You gain {Haste} when you use Flame Reave, but Flame Reave has a cooldown. Does not increase the duration of the cooldown if Flame Reave already has one.

fr11mv-17.name: Kindling
description: Flame Reave has a shorter cooldown.

fr11mv-18.name: Flame Caller
description: Flame Reave returns to you. Flame Reave's damage continues to decrease while returning, to a minimum of 20% of the initial damage.

fr11mv-19.name: Infernal Calling
description: Flame Reave pulls enemies with it while it returns to you, but now has a cooldown. Does not increase the duration of the cooldown if Flame Reave already has one.

fr11mv-20.name: Precise Destruction
description: Improves Flame Reave's base critical strike chance, but deals damage in a narrower area.
reminderText: Does not make Flame Reave narrower if you have the {Worldfire} node.

fr11mv-21.name: Infernal Alchemy
description: When you attack with Flame Reave and critically strike at least one enemy you gain ward.

fr11mv-22.name: Slash and Burn
description: Flame Reave hits have a chance to ignite enemies.

fr11mv-23.name: Scorching Tide
description: Flame Reave hits deal more melee damage against ignited enemies (multiplicative with other modifiers).

fr11mv-24.name: Chaos Flare
description: Flame Reave melee hits have more critical strike chance against ignited enemies (multiplicative with other modifiers)

fr11mv-25.name: Rolling Flames
description: Flame Reave travels faster, increasing its range.
reminderText: Multiplicative with the reduced speed from the {Dancing Flames} node.

fr11mv-26.name: Ashen Waste
description: Flame Reave's critical strikes deal more damage.

fr11mv-27.name: Unbound Flames
description: Flame Reave deals damage in a larger area.

fr11mv-28.name: Worldfire
description: Flame Reave hits enemies in an expanding circle centered on you, but has less range and costs significantly more mana.

fr11mv-29.name: Lingering Embers
description:
You have a chance to cast {Fire Aura} when you use Flame Reave.

Flame Reave has additional chance to Ignite on hit per active Fire Aura.
reminderText: Fire Aura is a spell that deals fire damage over time. You can have multiple fire auras active at once.

fr11mv-30.name: Accelerando
description:
Flame Reave requires fewer stacks of {Rhythm of Fire} to consume all stacks. This does not affect the bonuses from consuming stacks.

Additionally when Flame Reave consumes {Rhythm of Fire} stacks it gains additional critical strike chance.

frc87w-1.name: Rending Cascade
description: Frost Claw has a higher chance to freeze enemies and a higher chance to critically strike.

frc87w-2.name: Glamdring
description: Frost Claw deals additional spell damage based on your added melee damage.
reminderText: The type of added melee damage determines the type of spell damage gained. For example if you have +30 Melee Void Damage, Frost Claw will gain +10 Spell Void Damage.

frc87w-3.name: Cold Star
description: Frost Claw deals more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers) and its explosion deals damage in a larger area. These bonuses are doubled if you have at least 1200 ward.

frc87w-4.name: Gift of Winter
stats: 12% Chance to gain 12 mana on Direct Cast
description: Directly casting Frost Claw costs less mana and you have a chance to regain mana when you cast it.

frc87w-5.name: Lava Talon
description:
Frost Claw's base cold damage is converted to fire. Consequently this damage scales with increases to fire damage, but not increases to cold damage. 

Chill chance from all sources is converted to ignite chance.

Swaps Frost Claw's {Cold} tag for a {Fire} tag.

frc87w-6.name: Spark Artillery
description:
Frost Claw's base cold damage is converted to lightning, unless it has already been converted to fire. Consequently this damage scales with increases to lightning damage, but not increases to cold damage. 

Frostbite chance from all sources is converted to shock chance.

Swaps Frost Claw's {Cold} tag for a {Lightning} tag.

frc87w-7.name: Fen of the Frozen
description: Frost Claw hits have a chance to {Slow} and {Chill}.

frc87w-8.name: Brightfrost
description: You have increased cast speed with Frost Claw.

frc87w-9.name: Artor's Sceptre
description: Frost Claw deals more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers), and its hits have a chance to inflict {Frostbite}.

frc87w-10.name: Frost Beyond Time
description: Frostbite, chill, slow, ignite, and shock inflicted by Frost Claw last longer.

frc87w-11.name: Celestial Conflux
description:
You have a chance to cast {Elemental Nova} when Frost Claw's projectiles reach the target.

This consumes mana equal to Elemental Nova's mana cost and cannot trigger if you are out of mana.
reminderText: The chance is once per cast, not once per projectile.

frc87w-12.name: Cold and Calculating
stats: +5% Freeze Rate Multiplier per 1% Crit Chance
description: Frost Claw has a higher chance to freeze based on its critical strike chance.

frc87w-13.name: Kolheim Ballista
stats: +4% Ice Barrage Rate of Fire on Hit
