description: If you have an active {Ice Barrage} when you hit an enemy with Frost Claw, that Ice Barrage fires faster for the rest of its duration, up to a maximum.
reminderText: This fire rate modifier is multiplicative with other modifiers.

frc87w-14.name: Power Word: Hail
description:
You have a chance to cast {Ice Barrage} in the target direction when you cast Frost Claw.

This consumes mana equal to Ice Barrage's mana cost and cannot trigger if you are out of mana.

frc87w-16.name: Shiver Shell
description:
When you are hit by an enemy you have a chance to retaliate with Frost Claw.

When you cast Frost Claw by any method you gain Ward.

frc87w-17.name: Reowyn's Veil
description: When you cast Frost Claw you gain ward based on its Freeze Rate Multiplier.
reminderText: Addtional Freeze Rate Multiplier from this tree, including from Cold and Calculating, is taken into account for this node.

frc87w-18.name: Macuahuitl
stats: 10% Chance To Cast On Melee Hit
description:
When you use a melee attack and hit at least one enemy you have a chance to cast Frost Claw towards it, or at another nearby enemy if the hit killed the original target.

This effect consumes mana equal to a portion of Frost Claw's mana cost.

frc87w-20.name: Frozen Sleeper
notScalingStats: 1 Ice Spirals on Cast per Stack
description: Gain a stack of Frozen Sleeper every second up to a maximum. When you cast Frost Claw it consumes all stacks to gain cold penetration per stack and release an {Ice Spiral} for each stack.

frc87w-21.name: Chaos Whirl
description: When you cast {Ice Spirals} there is a chance that the number of projectiles will be doubled and they'll all deal double damage.
reminderText: The chance is calculated when Ice Spirals are cast and either applies to all of them or none of them with each cast.

frc87w-22.name: Age of Vengeance
stats: +12% Glacier Cold Penetration per Ice Spiral
+16% Snap Freeze Area per Ice Spiral
+4% Snap Freeze Freeze Duration per Ice Spiral
description: For each active {Ice Spiral}, Glacier gains increased area and additional cold penetration, and Snap Freeze gains increased area and freeze duration.
reminderText: These bonuses apply based on the number of your Ice Spirals that exist when you begin casting Glacier or Snap Freeze.

frc87w-24.name: On Through The Snow
description:
Directly casting Frost Claw causes it to recast from the target location to a location 4 meters behind it. The second can hit the same enemies as the first cast.

Frost Claw costs additional mana.

frc87w-25.name: Ever Onward
description:
The second cast from {On Through The Snow} causes a third cast. The third cast can hit the same enemies as the first and second casts.

Frost Claw costs additional mana.
reminderText: The third cast is aimed at a location 4 meters behind the second cast.

frc87w-26.name: Frozen Malice
description:
The second cast from {On Through The Snow} targets a random enemy that is 3 to 9 meters away from the original target location.

Frost Claw costs additional mana.

frc87w-27.name: A Crack in the Ice
description:
When the second cast from {On Through The Snow} is released, Frost Claw is also cast back towards you.

Frost Claw's mana cost is increased.

frc87w-28.name: Hand of Morditas
description:
Frost Claw has 2 additional projectiles allowing it to hit enemies in a wider area on the way to the target.

Frost Claw costs additional mana.

frc87w-29.name: Volley of Glass
description:
Frost Claw no longer creates a burst of damage at the target, but its projectiles are now staggered and they can all hit the same target.

Frost Claw's mana cost is increased, it no longer has the {Area} tag and it has a lowered base freeze rate.

frc87w-30.name: Frozen Reign
description: Frost Claw has a lower mana cost and it deals more hit damage (multiplicative with other modifiers) to frozen enemies, but its projectiles are slower.

frc87w-32.name: Spark of Celerity
description: Frost Claw's projectiles are faster and it costs less mana.

fw3d-2.name: Infusion
description:
Flame Ward grants increased fire damage while active

If Flame Ward is converted to cold or lightning, then this damage increase is also converted.

fw3d-3.name: Retribution
description: Flame Ward's retaliation hits deal more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers).

fw3d-4.name: Telepyrosis
description: Flame Ward's retaliation is centered on the enemy that hits you, but it hits in a smaller area.

fw3d-5.name: Blast Field
description: Flame Ward's retaliation hits in a larger area.

fw3d-6.name: Frost Ward
stats: 48 Fire Aura Freeze Rate Per Second
description:
Flame Ward is converted to Cold. This converts the base damage of the retaliation, granting it a freeze rate, and converts any fire damage modifiers from nodes on this tree.

This also globally converts {Fire Aura} to cold and grants it a Freeze Rate.

fw3d-7.name: Frostguard
description: Flame Ward grants armor while active.

fw3d-8.name: Glacial Reinforcement
description: Flame Ward grants additional block chance, block effectiveness, and ward on block while active.

fw3d-9.name: Rimeskin
description: Flame Ward's retaliation hits have a higher chance to freeze enemies.

fw3d-10.name: Lightning Ward
description:
Flame Ward is converted to Lightning, unless it has been converted to cold. This converts the base damage of the retaliation, and any fire damage modifiers from nodes on this tree.

This also globally converts {Fire Aura} to lightning, unless it has been converted to cold.

fw3d-11.name: Dilation
description: Flame Ward costs less mana. Flame Ward and Fire Aura last longer.

fw3d-12.name: Fire Aura
description: While active, Flame Ward grants you {Fire Aura}, a spell that deals fire damage over time to surrounding enemies.

fw3d-13.name: Eye of Flame
description: {Fire Aura} deals more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers). This also effects Fire Aura from sources other than Flame Ward.
reminderText: {Fire Aura} is a spell that deals fire damage over time to surrounding enemies.

fw3d-14.name: Energize
description: Flame Ward grants ward over time while active.

fw3d-15.name: Recollection
description: Flame Ward grants increased ward retention while active.

fw3d-16.name: Through Flames
description:
Flame Ward grants additional fire damage to attacks and spells while active.

If Flame Ward is converted to cold or lightning, then this added damage is also converted.

fw3d-17.name: Stalwart Defense
description: Flame Ward grants additional ward.

fw3d-18.name: Barrier
description: You take less damage from hits while Flame Ward is active (multiplicative with other modifiers).

fw3d-19.name: Prismatic Buffer
description: Flame Ward reduces elemental damage taken while active (multiplicative with other modifiers).

fw3d-20.name: Selfless Sorcery
description:
Flame Ward can be cast on allies.

This has no effect if you have taken the {Mental Aegis} node.

fw3d-21.name: Shrewd Shielding
description: Flame Ward costs less mana.

fw3d-22.name: Mental Aegis
description: Mana now absorbs damage while Flame Ward is active. Each point of mana shields 5 health and ward.

fw3d-23.name: Warmth
description: Flame Ward grants increased mana regeneration while active.

fw3d-25.name: Concentrated Shielding
description: Flame Ward grants additional ward, but has a shorter duration.

fw3d-27.name: Fortification
description: Flame Ward grants significantly more ward, but no longer retaliates.

fw3d-28.name: Desperate Defense
stats: 12% Percent Of Missing Health Granted As Ward
description: Flame Ward grants additional ward equal to a percentage of your missing health.

fw3d-29.name: Fuel The Flames
description: Flame Ward grants more ward, but has a longer cooldown.

fw3d-30.name: Dual Aegis
description: Flame Ward can store an additional charge, allowing you to use it twice before it goes on cooldown.

fw3d-31.name: Astonish
description: Flame Ward is cast when you are stunned, if it is off cooldown and you have positive mana.

fw3d-33.name: Flame Runner
description: You have {Haste} while Flame Ward is active.
reminderText: {Haste} grants 30% increased movement speed. Does not stack.

fw3d-34.name: Warden Pulse
description: Enemies around you are knocked back when you use Flame Ward

gl14-2.name: Chilling Force
description: Each of Glaciers explosions has a chance to chill enemies.

gl14-3.name: Lesser Destruction
description: Glaciers smallest explosion deals more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers).

gl14-4.name: Moderate Destruction
description: Glaciers middle-sized explosion deals more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers).

gl14-5.name: Greater Destruction
description: Glaciers largest explosion deals more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers).

gl14-6.name: Lesser Chilling
description: Glaciers smallest explosion has a chance to chill enemies.

gl14-7.name: Moderate Chilling
description: Glaciers middle-sized explosion deals more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers) and has a chance to chill enemies.

gl14-8.name: Greater Chilling
description: Glaciers largest explosion deals more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers) and has a chance to chill enemies.

gl14-9.name: Lesser Vortex
description: Glaciers smallest explosion has a chance to create an {Ice Vortex}, which lasts for 4 seconds and deals spell cold damage over time.
reminderText: {Ice Vortex} scales with increased to cold damage, damage over time, and spell damage, but not with other nodes on this tree.

gl14-10.name: Moderate Vortex
description: Glaciers middle-sized explosion has a greater chance to create an {Ice Vortex}, and the {Rime} buff has increased duration.
reminderText: {Ice Vortex} scales with increased to cold damage, damage over time, and spell damage, but not with other nodes on this tree.

gl14-11.name: Greater Vortex
description: Glaciers largest explosion has a greater chance to create an {Ice Vortex}, and the {Rime} buff has increased effect.
reminderText: {Ice Vortex} scales with increased to cold damage, damage over time, and spell damage, but not with other nodes on this tree.

gl14-12.name: Whirlpools
description: Each of Glaciers explosions has a chance to create an {Ice Vortex}, which lasts for 4 seconds and deals spell cold damage over time.
reminderText: {Ice Vortex} scales with increased to cold damage, damage over time, and spell damage, but not with other nodes on this tree.

gl14-13.name: Rime Caster
description: When you cast Glacier you gain the {Rime} buff which increases your damage over time and freeze rate multiplier.
reminderText:
Rime does not stack.

The Rime buff does affect the Glacier cast that grants it.

gl14-14.name: Lesser Glacier
description: Glacier costs less mana, but the largest explosion is disabled.

gl14-15.name: Cold Snap
description: Glaciers middle-sized explosion deals significantly more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers), but Glacier costs more mana.

gl14-16.name: Frost Grip
description: Glacier has an increased chance to freeze and stun enemies.

gl14-17.name: Critical Rejuvenation
description: Critical hits with Glacier grant mana equal to a percentage of your maximum mana, up to a limited number of times per second.

gl14-18.name: Cold Victory
stats: 1% Percent Of Maximum Mana Gained On Kill
description: Glacier kills grant mana equal to a percentage of your maximum mana.

gl14-19.name: Fading Echoes
description: Glaciers explosions occur in reverse order.

gl14-20.name: Resplendent Frost
description: Greatly improves Glaciers base critical strike chance, but reduces its critical strike multiplier.

gl14-21.name: Static Collapse
notScalingStats: Crits No Longer Deal Extra Damage
description: All of Glaciers explosions occur at a target location, but Glacier's critical hits no longer deal extra damage (compared to non-critical hits).

gl14-22.name: Perma Frost
description: Glacier has a higher chance to freeze enemies, but deals less damage (multiplicative with other modifiers).

gl14-24.name: Breaking Point
description: Glacier costs less mana and deals more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers).

gl14-25.name: Engulfing Vortex
description: {Ice Vortices} created by Glacier have a chance to instead become a {Greater Ice Vortex} that deals significantly more damage and has a larger radius.

gl14-26.name: Morditas' Bane
stats: +25% Hit Damage Against Rares And Bosses
description: Glacier deals more hit damage to rare and boss enemies (multiplicative with other modifiers).

gl14-27.name: Endless Frost
description: Chill chance granted by this tree is doubled. Glacier hits deal more damage to chilled enemies (multiplicative with other modifiers).

gl14-28.name: Critical Barrier
description: You gain ward on critical strikes with Glacier.

gl14-30.name: Snow Blink
stats: Does not use the Teleport Skill or Tree
description:
When you directly cast Glacier you are teleported to the target location, as long as the location is accessible. This does not count as casting the Teleport skill and is not affected by Teleport's skill tree.

Glacier also gains a cooldown and now counts as a {Traversal} skill.
reminderText: Using a Traversal skill puts all other traversal skills on cooldown and traversal skills' cooldowns do not recover while you are using a traversal skill.

gy2dm-1.name: Herald of Domination
description: The {Glyph} explosion deals more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers) per stack of slow on the target.

gy2dm-2.name: Astromage
description: Glyph of Dominion deals more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers) and costs less mana.

gy2dm-3.name: Astral Extension
stats: +10% Second Glyph Damage Per 1 Meter Distance
description: You can now place down up to two Glyphs of Dominion, but Glyph of Dominion costs more mana. When the first {Glyph} explodes the second one does too. The second explosion deals more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers) the further it is from the first one up to a maximum.

gy2dm-4.name: Careful Drawings
description: Glyph of Dominion expands slower and lasts a longer (both multiplicative with other modifiers). This increases the time before it reaches its full size to detonate.

gy2dm-5.name: Runecarver's Domain
description: Glyph of Dominion expands faster and lasts a shorter duration (both multiplicative with other modifiers). This decreases the time before it reaches its full size to detonate.

gy2dm-6.name: Attuned Shapes
stats: 1% More Expansion Speed Per 3 Missing Mana
description: Glyph of Dominion expands faster and lasts a shorter duration (both multiplicative with other modifiers) per amount of missing mana. This decreases the time before it reaches its full size to detonate.
reminderText: This effect also takes missing mana into account. For example if you are at -100 mana and have 200 maximum mana, you will gain 100% more expansion speed, which will cause it to fully expand and detonate in half the normal time.

gy2dm-7.name: Doom Scribe
description: After Glyph of Dominion its full size it now has a short delay before it detonates.

gy2dm-8.name: Runic Dominance
description: Glyph of Dominion now has a cooldown, which is refreshed whenever you directly cast {Runic Invocation}. It also deals more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers) per rune from {Runic Invocation}, without consuming them.

gy2dm-9.name: Power Word: Devastation
stats: +5 Frostbite Stacks Per Second Per Heo Rune
description:
Glyph of Dominion now consumes the {Runes} from {Runic Invocation} on cast to gain additional effects per {Rune} you have. 

{Rah Rune}: Glyph deals more damage in a larger area per {Rune} of this type.
{Gon Rune}: Glyph detonates additional times during the delay per {Rune} of this type.
{Heo Rune}: Glyph inflicts stacks of Frostbite per second per {Rune} of this type.

gy2dm-10.name: Perfect Design
description: Glyph of Dominion has additional charges and all charges are refreshed whenever you directly cast {Runic Invocation}.

gy2dm-11.name: Evoker of Elements
stats: Cast Elemental Nova When Delay Starts
description: You cast {Elemental Nova} in the middle of the {Glyph} if you stand inside it when the delay from {Doom Scribe} starts and you gain stacks of {Fire Aura}.

gy2dm-12.name: Wreak Havoc
description: Glyph of Dominion's damage over time part deals more damage for each second it is active (multiplicative with other modifiers).

gy2dm-13.name: Atomization
stats: +1% Damage Over Time Per Armor Shred
description: While standing on your {Glyph} you and your allies deal more damage over time (multiplicative with other modifiers) per stack of Armor Shred on the enemy, up to a maximum of 14 stacks.

gy2dm-14.name: Vaporizing Realm
description: Glyph of Dominion deals more damage over time (multiplicative with other modifiers).

gy2dm-15.name: Runes of Disintegration
stats: +40 Disintegrate Grants Ward Gain Per Second
description: {Disintegrate} deals more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers) and grants you ward per second if you start channelling it while standing on your {Glyph}.

gy2dm-16.name: Amplified Expanse
description: Glyph of Dominion deals damage in a larger area.

gy2dm-17.name: Charged Reflections
stats: +1 Ward Per Second Per 5% Uncapped Resistances
description: Glyph of Dominion is now cast at your current location and it grants you and your allies ward per second per your uncapped resistance while standing on your {Glyph}.

gy2dm-18.name: Arcane Mirror
description: You and your allies gain additional resistances while standing on your {Glyph}.

gy2dm-19.name: Static Sparks
description: After casting Glyph of Dominion you gain {Static Charges} at an accelerating rate while standing still, until your {Glyph} detonates.

gy2dm-20.name: Sanctuary Threshold
description:
Whenever you or your allies enters your Glyph of Dominion it cleanses ailments and grants the {Haste} buff for a short duration.

Leaving and re-entering the same {Glyph} does not cause this effect to trigger again.

gy2dm-21.name: Shocking Grasp
description: You and your allies gain additional Shock chance while standing on your {Glyph}.

gy2dm-22.name: Power Word: Stun
stats: 10% Stun Chance On Glyph Every 0.5 Seconds
description: Normal and Magic enemies have a chance to be stunned every half second while on your {Glyph}.

gy2dm-23.name: Tendrils of the Invoker
stats: +1 Lightning Blast Additional Chains on Glyph
description: Your {Lightning Blast} now chains while you are standing on your {Glyph}, but consumes mana when cast this way while you are at positive mana.
reminderText:
If {Lightning Blast} already chains, then this effect adds additional chains.

If {Lightning Blast} is channelled, then instead of adding mana consumption it is added to the channel cost.

gy2dm-24.name: Mage's Decree
stats: +30% Spells and Attacks Area on Glyph
description: You and your allies gain increased area to spells and attacks while standing on your {Glyph}.

gy2dm-25.name: Flaming Scroll
description:
{Glyph of Dominion's} base lightning damage is converted to fire. Consequently this damage scales with increases to fire damage, but not increases to lightning damage.

Shock chance from all sources is converted to ignite for Glyph of Dominion and effects related to shock now depend on ignite instead.

Swaps {Glyph of Dominion's} {Lightning} tag for a {Fire} tag.

Ignite chance is halved for minions and other allies.

gy2dm-26.name: Burning Symbol
description: Glyph of Dominion ignites enemies on the {Glyph} every half second.

gy2dm-27.name: Fan the Inferno
stats: 1% Increased Ignite Frequency Per Ignite Chance
description: The ignite frequency from {Burning Symbol} is increased by your chance to ignite.

ib5g3-0.name: Ice Barrage
description: Repeatedly casts Ice Shareds in a target direction.

ib5g3-2.name: Frigid Barrage
description: Ice Barrage hits have a higher chance to freeze enemies.

ib5g3-3.name: Subthermal Velocity
description:
When a target is frozen by Ice Barrage, you are granted increased cast speed for 4 seconds.

This effect can stack a limited number of times.

ib5g3-4.name: Intensifying Cold
stats: +10% Freeze Rate Multiplier Per Ice Shard
description:
Each ice shard released by Ice Barrage has a higher chance of freezing enemies than the previous shard.

This effect resets when Ice Barrage is recast.

ib5g3-5.name: Frigid Doom
description: When Ice Barrage hits an enemy it has a chance to cast {Frost Nova}, a cold spell that damages nearby enemies.

ib5g3-6.name: Hail Storm
description: Ice Barrage has a faster rate of fire.

ib5g3-7.name: Warding Bolts
description: You have a chance to gain ward on hit with Ice Barrage.

ib5g3-8.name: Cryogenesis
description: Ice Barrage deals more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers), but has a shorter duration.

ib5g3-9.name: Ice Spire
description: Ice Barrage has a faster rate of fire, but you move more slowly while it is active.

ib5g3-10.name: Ice Shield
description:
When you cast Ice Barrage you now also summon an {Ice Shield} in the target direction, a shield that blocks projectiles. Ice Shield lasts 2 seconds.

Ice Barrage has a longer cooldown.

ib5g3-11.name: Shattering Bulwark
description: When {Ice Shield} expires it explodes, freezing nearby enemies.

ib5g3-12.name: Deep Shield
description: {Ice Shield} lasts longer, but Ice Barrage has a longer cooldown.

ib5g3-13.name: Frost Armor
description: While {Ice Shield} is active, you deal more global cold damage and take less cold damage (multiplicative with other modifiers).

ib5g3-14.name: Looming Frost
description:
Each ice shard released by Ice Barrage deals more damage than the previous shard (multiplicative with other modifiers).

This bonus stacks, but is reset on recasting Ice Barrage.

ib5g3-15.name: Sleetfire
description:
Ice Barrage has significantly increased fire rate, but you become {Silenced}, losing a large amount of mana and other skills costs more mana. 

You regain the lost mana from this use when Ice Barrage ends.

ib5g3-16.name: Eternal Winter
description: Ice Barrage lasts longer.

ib5g3-17.name: Challenge the Elements
stats: 10% Increased Fire Rate Against Rare Enemies
description: Ice Barrage hits against bosses and rare enemies grant increased fire rate to the remaining hits. This effect stacks up to a cap.
reminderText: This bonus is additive with other sources of Increased Rate of Fire on this tree.

ib5g3-19.name: Brightlance
description: Ice Barrage hits deal more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers), but no longer seek nearby enemies.

ib5g3-20.name: Aura of Frost
description: Ice Barrage creates a {Chilling Aura} around you. The aura repeatedly applies chill to nearby enemies for a duration. This effect can apply multiple stacks of chill to the same enemy.

ib5g3-21.name: Biting Cold
description: Ice Barrage deals more cold damage (multiplicative with other modifiers) and has more critical strike chance.

ib5g3-22.name: Nailed Shot
description: Each ice shard cast by Ice Barrage has a chance to pierce all enemies (continue through enemies hit).

ib5g3-23.name: Hypothermia
description: Ice Shards that pierce enemies have a chance to inflict them with {Frostbite}.

ib5g3-24.name: Sublimation
description:
Ice Barrage deals more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers), and its ice shards become larger.

Ice Barrage has a slower fire rate, and there is a longer delay between each shard being created and released.
reminderText:
The fire rate modifier is multiplicative with other fire rate modifiers on this tree.

The change to the delay does not affect the frequence at which shards are created.

ib5g3-25.name: Wintry Blast
description: Ice Barrage now fire 5 ice shards in a cone in front of you, but has a slower fire rate and costs more mana.
reminderText: The fire rate modifier is multiplicative with other fire rate modifiers on this tree.

ib5g3-26.name: Yrun's Conquest
description: Ice Barrage releases ice shards in a wider cone.

ib5g3-27.name: Brittle Fragments
description: Ice Shards cast by Ice Barrage shatter and deal cold damage in a cone behind the target. This does not work on piercing projectiles.

ib5g3-28.name: Frozen Ballista
description: Ice Barrage deals significantly more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers) and has a shorter cooldown, but now only lasts 1 second and fires 3 projectiles.
reminderText: This node does not prevent additional projectiles created with Wintry Blast or Ice Burst.

ib5g3-29.name: Jagged Ice
stats: 20% More Crit Chance Against Frozen Targets
description: Ice Barrage has more critical strike chance against frozen targets (multiplicative with other modifiers).

ib5g3-30.name: Shattered Skin
stats: 15% More Hit Damage To Frozen Targets
description: Ice Barrage hits deal more damage to frozen targets (multiplicative with other modifiers).

ib5g3-31.name: Ice Burst
description: Ice Barrage instantly fires 5 ice shards in a cone.

ib5g3-32.name: Arctic Storm
description: Ice shards released via {Ice Burst} have a higher chance to freeze enemies, and deal more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers).

lb23il-2.name: Arcing Power
notScalingStats: 1 Additional Chains Per Recent Direct Cast
description: Lightning Blast chains an additional time for each Lightning Blast you have directly cast recently up to a maximum.
reminderText:
This raises the maximum chains from the base effect. It is not a separate counter.
Recently refers to the last 4 seconds. Does not include triggered casts of Lightning Blast.

lb23il-3.name: Surging Influence
description: Lightning Blast chains have increased range.

lb23il-4.name: Crackling Speed
description: Lightning Blast has increased cast speed.

lb23il-5.name: Shattershock
description: Lightning Blast hits deal more damage to chilled or shocked enemies (multiplicative with other modifiers).
reminderText: These bonuses stack multiplicatively with each other if an enemy is both shocked and chilled.

lb23il-6.name: Closed Circuit
description: Lightning Blast can now chain to you or your allies, granting increased damage and critical strike chance for 4 seconds. This buff cannot stack.

lb23il-7.name: Blinding Light
description: Lightning Blast hits have a chance to blind enemies.

lb23il-8.name: Halo Effect
description: Lightning Blast has a chance to create a {Spark Nova} around the first enemy hit. Spark Nova deals spell lightning damage to all enemies in a small area.

lb23il-9.name: Volatile Lightning
description: Lightning Blast hits have a chance to shock enemies.

lb23il-10.name: Supercharged Floes
description:
Lightning Blast now has a chance to freeze and its base lightning damage is converted to cold damage. Consequently this damage scales with increases to cold damage, but not increases to lightning damage.

Shock chance from this tree is converted to chill chance.

lb23il-11.name: Bitter Burst
description: Lightning Blast has a higher chance to freeze enemies.

lb23il-12.name: Positive Protection
description: Lightning Blast hits grant you ward.

lb23il-13.name: Insidious Conduction
description:
Lightning Blast is now a powerful channelled attack, hitting enemies caught within it but costs mana per second to channel and provides less ward when you hit enemies. You do not regenerate mana while channelling.

This is incompatible with the {Focal Blast} node. If you have taken both, this will not work.

Lightning Blast cannot double cast and only chains every 5th cast if it is channelled.

Lightning blast hits grant half as much ward from the {Positive Protection} node and have 50% reduced chance to apply ailments.

lb23il-14.name: Effluent Defense
description: Casting Lightning Blast grants you ward per mana spent. This only counts the upfront mana cost, not the channelling cost if Lightning Blast is channelled.

lb23il-15.name: Storm Razor
description: Improves Lightning Blast's base critical strike chance, and Lightning Blast deals more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers).

lb23il-16.name: Chain Lightning
description: Lightning blast can chain additional times, but costs more mana.

lb23il-17.name: Focal Blast
stats: Lightning Blast Deals Damage In A Line
description:
Lightning Blast now deals damage to all enemies in a line, but no longer chains or forks. Lightning Blast hits deal more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers) for each time it would have chained (up to your maximum).

This node is incompatible with the {Insidious Conduction} node. If you have taken both, {Insidious Conduction} will not work.

lb23il-18.name: Convergence
stats: Lightning Blast Chains Only To First Target Hit
description: Lightning Blast chains now hit the same target after a delay, but no longer chains to additional enemies. Lightning Blast chains half as many times rounded up.
reminderText: This effect overrides the forking behavior from {Divergence}.

lb23il-19.name: Divergence
stats: Lightning Blast Can Fork Or Chain
description: Lightning Blast hits have added lightning damage, and Lightning Blast chains can fork in addition to chain.
reminderText: Lightning Blast hits an additional target when it forks. Forking counts as chaining for number of targets that it can hit.

lb23il-21.name: Lightning Attunement
description: When you cast Lightning Blast you have a chance to be granted {Lightning Aegis,} which grants 50% increased lightning damage and 25% less damage taken. Lightning Aegis causes an explosion of lightning damage when you lose 25% of your health or after 10 seconds.

lb23il-22.name: Overcharge
description:
Lightning Blast has a chance to double cast, and Lightning Blast critical strikes deal more damage.

Lightning Blast cannot double cast if it is channelled or cast by another skill.

lb23il-24.name: Frontloaded
description: Lightning Blast deals more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers), but this damage bonus is lessened each time Lightning Blast chains.
reminderText: The less bonus damage per chain results in no bonus damage from this node on the fourth chain and beyond, but does not negatively impact your damage any further.

lb23il-25.name: Cloud Answer
description: Lightning Blast hits have a chance to apply a {Spark Charge}.

lb23il-26.name: Mortal Capacitor
description: {Spark Charges} applied by Lightning Blast deal more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers).

lb23il-27.name: Final Spark
description: If Lightning Blast hits an enemy already affected by {Spark Charge} the Spark Charge explodes, dealing lightning damage to all nearby enemies.

lb23il-28.name: Innate Conduit
description: While out of mana, Lightning Blast has no cost, but cannot chain.

lb23il-30.name: Hypercharge
description:
When double casting, Lightning Blast instead has a chance to quadruple cast.

Lightning Blast cannot quadruple cast if it is channelled.

lb23il-32.name: Countenance of Mana
stats: -10 Mana Cost Per Second if Lightning Blast Cannot Chain
description: Reduces Lightning Blast's channel cost if Lightning Blast cannot chain.
reminderText: Taking the {Arcing Power} node prevents this mana cost reduction even if your first lightning blast cast does not chain.

me27-2.name: Infernal Descent
description: Meteor deals more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers), but Meteor has reduced cast speed.

me27-3.name: Celestial Celerity
description: Meteor has increased cast speed, but costs more mana. Meteors fall faster.

me27-4.name: Crushing Force
description: Meteor deals more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers) and even more against enemies at full health.

me27-5.name: Shattering Star
description: Meteor has a chance to break into {Shrapnel} on impact, hitting nearby enemies.
reminderText: {Shrapnel} scales with increases to spell damage and fire damage, but not with other nodes on this tree unless stated otherwise.

me27-6.name: Jagged Fragments
description: {Shrapnel} deals more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers).
reminderText: {Shrapnel} scales with increases to spell damage and fire damage, but not with other nodes on this tree unless stated otherwise.

me27-7.name: Rapid Break Up
description: {Shrapnel} travels faster, causing it to travel further.
reminderText: {Shrapnel} scales with increases to spell damage and fire damage, but not with other nodes on this tree unless stated otherwise.

me27-8.name: Piercing Remnants
description: {Shrapnel} projectiles pierce (continue through targets they hit), but travel slower.
reminderText: {Shrapnel} scales with increases to spell damage and fire damage, but not with other nodes on this tree unless stated otherwise.

me27-9.name: Force of Impact
description: Meteor has a chance to stun enemies and stuns it inflict last longer.

me27-10.name: Stardust
description: Meteors deal more damage of all types except fire (multiplicative with other modifiers).
reminderText: Meteor deals only fire damage by default, so for this node to have an any effect you must first add non-fire damage from another source, such as an item.

me27-11.name: Rapid Descent
description: Meteor falls faster.

me27-12.name: Twin Meteors
stats: +1 Number Of Meteors For Direct Casts
description: When directly cast, an additional Meteor falls within a 4m radius of the first, but Meteor costs much more mana.
reminderText: Increased Area for Area Skills stats still only affect the area of effect of each individual meteor, not the size of the area in which they drop.

me27-13.name: Distant Craters
description: Meteor deals more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers), but meteors fall further apart.

me27-14.name: Meteor Shower
stats: +1 Number Of Meteors For Direct Casts
description: When directly cast, more Meteors fall per cast, but individual Meteors deal damage in a smaller area.

me27-15.name: Rapid Impacts
description: Meteors fall more frequently. This does not affect the total number of Meteors that fall.

me27-16.name: Infernal Column
description: Meteors fall in a line towards where you aim, but Meteor costs more mana.

me27-17.name: Mana Fall
description: Meteor costs less mana.

me27-18.name: Apocalyptic Impact
description: Meteors deals damage in a larger area of effect.

me27-19.name: Extinction
description: Improves Meteor's base critical strike chance. Meteor has a chance to deal damage in a significantly larger area.

me27-20.name: Astral Cataclysm
description: Meteor critical strikes deal more damage.

me27-22.name: Rain of Fire
stats: +1 Number Of Meteors For Direct Casts
description: When directly cast, more Meteors fall per cast.

me27-23.name: World Ender
description: Meteor always crits if you have more than 400 mana before you cast it.

me27-24.name: Aftermath
description:
After you cast Meteor you recover a portion of the mana spent over the next three seconds. 

You can only recover mana from one cast at once, so if you cast meteor again within three seconds you lose the remaining mana you would have recovered from the first cast.

me27-25.name: Craterborn
description: Casting Meteor grants the {Craterborn} buff, granting additional fire penetration and increased cast speed for a short duration. Craterborn does not stack.

me27-26.name: Cycle of Fire
description: Casting Fireball while you have {Craterborn} grants ward and restores your mana.

ms26-2.name: Swift Sap
description: Mana Strike has increased attack speed.

ms26-3.name: Rage Sap
description: You deal increased damage if you have hit an enemy with Mana Strike recently (past 4 seconds).

ms26-4.name: Rune Sap
stats: 4% Global Spell Damage Per Enemy Hit
description: Mana Strike hits grant you increased spell damage for 4 seconds. This effect can stack.

ms26-5.name: Teleporting Strikes
description: Mana Strike hits enemies at a target location, rather than in front of you, but grants significantly less mana.

ms26-6.name: Bountiful Victory
stats: 3 Mana Gain On Rare Or Boss Hit
description: Mana Strike grants mana when it kills an enemy, or when it hits a rare or boss enemy.

ms26-7.name: Critical Mana
description: Mana Strike grants mana when it critically strikes an enemy.

ms26-8.name: Critical Rejuvenation
description: Significantly improves Mana Strikes base critical strike chance, but Mana Strike no longer deals more critical strike damage.

ms26-9.name: Mana Drain
description: Mana Strike grants you more mana.

ms26-10.name: Mana Cleave
description: Mana Strike grants twice as much mana on hit and hits in a much larger area, but has a cooldown and less attack speed (multiplicative with other modifiers).

ms26-11.name: Repulsing Strikes
description:
Mana Strike has a chance to knock enemies back on hit.

This effect has a 2 second cooldown.

ms26-12.name: Spark Charges
description: Mana Strike hits have a chance to attach a {Spark Charge}.

ms26-13.name: Celestial Precision
description: Mana Strike gains base critical strike chance equal to a percentage of your current mana, but loses a fixed amount of base critical strike chance.

ms26-14.name: Mana Spark
description: Mana Strike has additional melee lightning damage equal to a percentage of your current mana.

ms26-15.name: Starved Strikes
description: Mana Strike deals more damage while you are out of mana.

ms26-16.name: Avatar of Hunger
description: Mana Strike deals more damage when you are out of mana (multiplicative with other modifiers), but also grant less mana.

ms26-17.name: Mana Storm
description: Mana Strike additionally strikes enemies it hits with {Mana Arc} while you are not out of mana. {Mana Arc} consumes 15 mana.
reminderText: {Mana Arc} scales with increases to spell damage and lightning damage, and can benefit from other nodes on this tree.

ms26-18.name: Explosive Flurry
description: Mana Strike has increased attack speed. {Mana Arc} created by {Mana Storm} costs less mana.

ms26-19.name: Essence of Control
description: {Mana Arc} created by {Mana Storm} costs less mana.

ms26-20.name: Sprite Blade
description: Mana Strike deals damage in a larger area.

ms26-21.name: Reclamation
stats: +5 Mana Gained While Out Of Mana
description: Mana Strike grants more mana on hit while you are out of mana.

ms26-22.name: Arcanist's Blade
description: Mana Strike grants you more mana if it hits an enemy.

ms26-23.name: Ward Strike
description: When you attack with Mana Strike and hit at least one enemy you gain ward

ms26-24.name: Transfusion
description: A portion of mana gained on hit is converted to ward instead.

ms26-25.name: Mind Warden
description: Mana Strike hits grant more ward.

ms26-26.name: Star Guide
description: Mana Strike automatically targets the enemy closest to the cursor and has improved base critical strike chance.

ms26-28.name: Frigid Grasp
description:
Mana Strike's base lightning damage is converted to cold. Consequently this damage scales with increases to cold damage, but not increases to lightning damage. It now has a chance to freeze enemies.

Shock chance on hit from all sources is converted to frostbite chance for Mana Strike.

Swaps Mana Strike's {Lightning} tag for a {Cold} tag.

rn7iv-2.name: Unbridled Ruin
description: Runic Invocation deals more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers) per {Rune} consumed.

rn7iv-3.name: Stride to Safety
description:
When you directly cast Runic Invocation you leap backwards a short distance, hovering in the air for a moment. In this state you take less damage and directly casting Runic Invocation deals more damage (both multiplicative with other modifiers). 

The effect of {Enigma} no longer works when taking this node.

Runic Invocation gains the {Movement} tag.

rn7iv-4.name: Warmage's Initiative
description:
When you directly cast Runic Invocation now leap forwards instead of backwards. 

The effect of {Enigma} no longer works when taking this node.

Runic Invocation gains the {Movement} tag.

rn7iv-5.name: Interlude
description:
During the leap you also cast the Invocation corresponding to your first two {Runes}, consuming its mana cost.

Your Invocation must have at least two runes for this effect to occur.

rn7iv-6.name: Prologue
description:
During the leap you also cast the Invocation corresponding to your first {Rune}, consuming its mana cost.

Your Invocation must have at least one rune for this effect to occur.

rn7iv-7.name: Attuned Approach
description: Runic Invocation grants ward per {Rune} consumed and on direct casts you refund a portion of its mana cost.

rn7iv-8.name: Rune Slinger
description: Runic Invocation has increased cast speed and when directly casting an {Invocation} you gain ward equal to a portion of your current mana.

rn7iv-9.name: Elementalist's Call
description: When you directly cast Runic Invocation, the next non-channelled elemental spell you cast penetrates enemy elemental resistance and deals damage in a larger area.

rn7iv-10.name: Mastery of the Invoker
stats: 6% Invocations Chance On Other Skill Use
description: When you consume {Runes} with a skill other than Runic Invocation you have a chance to also cast the corresponding {Invocation} for those runes.

rn7iv-11.name: Glyphcarver's Dominance
description: {Invocations} that deal damage in an area now deal damage in a larger area.

rn7iv-12.name: Word of Rahyeh
stats: +6 Spell Fire Damage With Rah Rune
description: {Invocations} that include at least one {Rah Rune} have a chance to ignite enemies and deal additional spell fire damage.

rn7iv-13.name: Inscribed Patterns
stats: 2% Increased Mana Regen per Rah Rune
+4 Ward Gain Per Second per Gon Rune
+8% Freeze Rate Multiplier per Heo Rune
description:
Runes now provide you with passive effects while you have them.

{Rah Rune}: Grants increased mana regeneration per {Rune} of this type.
{Gon Rune}: Grants ward per second per {Rune} of this type.
{Heo Rune}: Grants a higher chance to freeze enemies per {Rune} of this type.

rn7iv-14.name: Runic Energy
notScalingStats: +2% Damage Per Stack Of Runic Energy
description: Every second you go without casting a Runic Invocation you gain a stack of {Runic Energy} up to a maximum. {Invocations} consume all {Runic Energy} to deal more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers) per {Runic Energy}.

rn7iv-15.name: Spell Cascade
stats: Cast Random Equipped Skill With 12 Energy
description:
When you directly cast Runic Invocation with at least 12 {Runic Energy} you also proc a random equipped non-channeling skill of the same element as each of the {Runes} consumed.

This effect consumes these skills' mana costs and puts them on cooldown (excluding movement skills and skills that are currently on cooldown).

These skills are cast at 0.24 second intervals after the {Invocation}.

rn7iv-16.name: Copied Scrolls
description: Runic Invocation now has a chance to be repeated per stack of {Runic Energy}.

rn7iv-17.name: Rune Powercore
stats: +1 Gain Runic Energy While At 3 Runes
description: While you have 3 runes and your combination of runes changes without casting an invocation, you gain {Runic Energy}.

rn7iv-18.name: Arcane Battery
description: Your maximum {Runic Energy} is tripled, but bonuses per {Runic Energy} are halved. When you cast a skill you gain {Runic Energy} per mana spent.

rn7iv-19.name: Runic Energizer
stats: Accumulation Speed Resets On Repeat Invocation
description: Each unique {Invocation} you directly cast causes {Runic Energy} to accumulate faster until you repeat an {Invocation}.

rn7iv-20.name: Word of Heorot
stats: +60% Freeze Rate Multiplier With Heo Rune
description: {Invocations} that include at least one {Heo Rune} have a chance to chill enemies and have a higher chance to freeze them.

rn7iv-21.name: Author of Arcana
description: Directly casting Runic Invocation now refunds its mana cost and it deals more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers), but it now has a cooldown when cast this way.
reminderText: You cannot refund more than 100% of Runic Invocation's mana cost.

rn7iv-22.name: Immutable Order
stats: Rune Gain Depend On Skills On Action Bar
description:
Whenever you gain a {Rune}, instead of it depending on the type of skill cast, it always results in your sequence of {Runes} mirroring the first three skills on your action bar from left to right.

This effect ignores skills that don't have an elemental tag.
reminderText:
If a skill has multiple elements, the {Rune} it provides is chosen based on the least common elements among all 3 skills. 

For example casting {Disintegrate, Lightning Blast, Static Orb} in a sequence gives {Rah, Gon and Gon Runes}.

This effect ignores Runic Invocation itself when looking at the abilities on your bar.

rn7iv-23.name: Adept Runescribing
description: Runic Invocation has a shorter cooldown.

rn7iv-24.name: Consolidator
stats: 6% Cooldown Reduction When Rune Combination Changes
description: While you have 3 {Runes} and your combination of {Runes} changes without casting an {Invocation}, Runic Invocation's remaining cooldown is reduced.

rn7iv-25.name: Enigma
description:
Whenever you directly cast an {Invocation} you blink to the target location first, but Runic Invocation now has a cooldown. 

{Invocations} cast this way automatically targets a random nearby enemy.

Runic Invocation gains the {Traversal} tag.
reminderText: All the effects of this node do not affect Runic Invocation if you have taken the {Stride to Safety} node.

rn7iv-26.name: Transcriber of Power
description:
After casting Runic Invocation you gain additional spell damage and cast speed for a short duration. 

The buff duration scales with amount of {Runes} consumed.

rn7iv-27.name: Word of Lagon
stats: +3% Critical Strike Chance With Gon Rune
description: {Invocations} that include at least one {Gon Rune} have a chance to shock enemies and have a higher chance to critically hit enemies.

rn7iv-28.name: Devastating Starfall
description: Runic Invocation deals more damage per type of {Rune} consumed.

rn7iv-29.name: Cosmic Mind
stats: 3 Ward Gain Per Intelligence With Different Runes
description: When you cast an {Invocation} using a sequence of three different {Runes} you gain ward per point of intelligence.

rn7iv-30.name: Elemental Starfield
stats: Cast Elemental Novas From Runes In Invocation
description:
Whenever you cast Runic Invocation, you also cast up to one of each type of {Elemental Nova} that you can cast directly. Each unique {Rune} you have when casting Runic Invocation represents different {Elemental Nova}. 

These {Novas} are cast with a 0.3 second interval.

This effect consumes mana equal to {Elemental Nova's} mana cost.
reminderText:
{Rah Rune}: Fire Nova
{Gon Rune}: Lightning Nova
{Heo Rune}: Ice Nova

If you don't have any of the three Elemental Nova types unlocked, then you'll cast one Elemental Nova if you have at least one rune.

rn7iv-32.name: Scrivener's Haste
description:
You gain {Runes} faster while channelling.

You gain a burst of ward based on your maximum mana when your number of runes increases from channelling.

rn7iv-34.name: Elemental Lore
description: Runic Invocation penetrates elemental resistances per point of Intelligence.

sb44eQ-1.name: Celerity
description: {Active:} You have increased melee attack speed.

sb44eQ-2.name: Fulminate
description: {Passive:} You have a chance to shock enemies with melee attacks (doubled while active).

sb44eQ-3.name: Thundering
description: {Active:} You deal additional lightning damage with melee attacks, and deal increased lightning damage with melee attacks.

sb44eQ-4.name: Conduit
description: {Active:} You {Zap} a nearby enemy every 2 seconds, dealing spell lightning damage.
reminderText: {Zap} scales with spell damage and lightning damage, but not other nodes on this skill tree.

sb44eQ-5.name: Capacitance
description: {Zap} is cast more frequently.
reminderText: {Zap} scales with spell damage and lightning damage, but not other nodes on this skill tree.

sb44eQ-6.name: Draw Power
description: {Active:} You leech a portion of the fire and lightning damage you deal with melee attacks as health.

sb44eQ-7.name: Molten Steel
description: {Active:} You deal additional fire damage with melee attacks, and deal increased fire damage with melee attacks.

sb44eQ-8.name: Immolating Strike
description: {Passive:} You have a chance to ignite enemies with melee attacks (doubled while active).

sb44eQ-9.name: Eternal Flames
description: {Passive:} Ignites you inflict last longer (doubled while active).

sb44eQ-10.name: Conflagrate
description: Activating Enchant Weapon consumes all ignite stacks on nearby enemies, causing their damage to be dealt instantly.

sb44eQ-11.name: Searing Conflagration
description: Ignites consumed by {Conflagrate} deal significantly more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers).

sb44eQ-12.name: Burst of Fire
description: {Active:} Hitting ignited enemies casts a {Fire Burst} towards them. This effect has a 2 second cooldown.
reminderText: {Fire Burst} deals fire damage on hit and scales with increases to spell damage and fire damage but not other nodes on this tree, unless stated otherwise.

sb44eQ-13.name: Flameblast
description: {Fire Burst} deals more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers), and Fire Burst has a shorter cooldown.
reminderText: {Fire Burst} deals fire damage on hit and scales with increases to spell damage and fire damage but not other nodes on this tree, unless stated otherwise.

sb44eQ-14.name: Concentration
description: Enchant Weapon is active for longer.

sb44eQ-15.name: Desperation
stats: 1% Melee Elemental Damage Per 2% Missing Mana
description: {Active:} You deal increased elemental damage with melee attacks proportional to how much mana you are missing when Enchant Weapon is activated.

sb44eQ-16.name: Efficacy
description:
{Passive:} Activating Enchant Weapon costs less mana.

{Active:} You deal increased elemental damage with melee attacks.

sb44eQ-17.name: Kindling Blade
description: Enchant Weapon activates automatically once its cooldown expires.

sb44eQ-19.name: Frozen Sparks
description: {Active:} You deal additional cold and lightning damage with melee attacks for each 10 physical damage that is on your weapon.
reminderText: If you have 19 physical damage on your weapon, you will receive +1 cold and +1 lightning melee damage. If you have less than 10 physical damage on your weapon, this node does nothing.

sb44eQ-20.name: Shivering Blade
description: {Passive:} You have an increased chance to chill enemies with melee attacks (doubled while active).

sb44eQ-21.name: Icicle Strike
description: {Active:} Your melee attacks have a chance to cast {Icicles} towards enemies they hit.
reminderText: {Icicles} deal cold damage on hit and scale with spell damage and cold damage, but not other nodes of this tree.

sb44eQ-22.name: To The Bone
description: {Icicles} now pierce (continue through targets it hits).
reminderText: {Icicles} deal cold damage on hit and scale with spell damage and cold damage, but not other nodes of this tree.

sb44eQ-23.name: Frostbrand
description: {Active:} You deal additional cold damage with melee attacks, and deal increased cold damage with melee attacks.

sb44eQ-24.name: Overloaded
description: Activating Enchant Weapon causes your next melee elemental attack to be free.

sb44eQ-25.name: Cleansed by the Elements
description: Activating Enchant Weapon cleanses negative ailments, but costs more mana.

sb44eQ-26.name: Unstable Enchantment
description: You cast Elemental Nova when you activate Enchant Weapon. You pay Elemental Nova's mana cost in addition to Enchant Weapon.

so35a-2.name: Shocking Conduit
description: Static Orb hits has a chance to shock enemies.

so35a-3.name: Manacharged
description: Static Orb deals more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers) per 25 maximum mana, but Static Orb costs additional mana equal to a portion of your maximum mana, up to a maximum.

so35a-4.name: Static Ground
description: The explosion now leaves behind {Charged Ground} dealing lightning damage over time in an area. Creating another Charged Ground halves the remaining duration of all existing ones.

so35a-5.name: Electrocuting Cascade
description: {Charged Ground} deals more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers) per additonal critical strike multiplier.

so35a-6.name: Charged Allies
description: You and allies have additonal shock chance and increased shock effectiveness while inside {Charged Ground's} area.

so35a-7.name: Insidious Focus
description: Static Orb costs less mana, but it no longer pulls enemies.

so35a-8.name: Ball Lightning
stats: 20% Small Orb Chance with Scatter Blast
description:
Static Orb costs significantly less mana, but it now has a chance to not explode.

If you {Scatter Blast} then you only have a chance to create small orbs, and if you have {Orbital Fulmination} all static orbs orbit you for a reduced duration.

so35a-9.name: Recurring Orb
description:
If Static Orb does not explode it returns to you and deals damage on the way back, but it costs more mana.

This node has no effect if you have {Orbital Fulmination}.

so35a-10.name: Biting Force
description:
Static Orb's base lightning damage is converted to cold and it gains a base freeze rate, but it no longer pulls enemies. Consequently this damage scales with increases to cold damage, but not increases to lightning damage.

Shock chance from all sources is converted to {Frostbite} and effects related to shock now depend on Frostbite instead.

so35a-11.name: Wintry Power
description: The orb and the explosion have a higher chance to freeze enemies.

so35a-12.name: Glacial Orb
description: The orb and the explosion have a higher chance to freeze enemies, but the explosion no longer creates Tendrils.

so35a-13.name: Orbital Fulmination
description:
The orb now orbits you for up to 3 seconds before exploding, but you are limited to a few orbs and casting more will detonate older ones.

Static Orb gains damage and explosion area with time rather than travel distance, but scales up to the same maximum as before.

so35a-14.name: Storm Conductor
description: Static Orb deals more spell damage (multiplicative with other modifiers) to shocked enemies.

so35a-15.name: Arcane Current
description: Static Orb generates {Static Charges} on hit.
reminderText: This effect doesn't work for the explosion.

so35a-16.name: Overwhelming Barrage
description: The explosion has a higher chance to stun, increased stun duration and you gain ward on stun with the explosion.

so35a-17.name: Critical Trajectory
description: Static Orb's critical strikes deal more damage.

so35a-18.name: Forking Surge
description: The explosion creates additional {Tendrils} to hit enemies outside the explosion area.

so35a-19.name: Static Armor
description: Static Orb grants you {Lightning Aegis} for a short duration on cast, which grants 50% increased lightning damage and 25% less damage taken. Lightning Aegis causes an explosion of lightning damage when you lose 25% of your health or after 10 seconds.

so35a-20.name: Storm Burst
description: Static Orb deals more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers) in a larger area, but automatically explodes after 4 meters.

so35a-21.name: Volatile Outburst
description: The explosion's damage ramps up more with distance, but it travels slower.

so35a-22.name: Storm Artillery
description: Static Orb deals more damage and now travel faster and in an arcing trajectory rather than a straight line, but it no longer pulls or hits enemies until it explodes.
reminderText: This effect does not affect small orbs from {Scatter Blast}.

so35a-23.name: Fusionblast
description: After using Static Orb the next {Lightning Blasts} cast from any source chain 2 additonal times.

so35a-24.name: Atomic Manipulation
description:
For 4 seconds after using Static Orb directly casting {Lightning Blast} and hitting at least one enemy will return 25% of Static Orb's mana cost. 

This effect can only occur a limited number of times.

so35a-25.name: Open Circuit
description: Static Orb travels faster and deals more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers).

so35a-26.name: Overcharged Detonation
stats: +1% Orb Hit Damage Per 1 Mana Cost
description: Static Orb explodes on hit rather than piercing enemies. The orb deals more hit damage (multiplicative with other modifiers) per 1 mana cost.

so35a-27.name: Auxiliary Capacity
description: You have a chance to cast an additional Static Orb towards the target when it hits a rare enemy or boss. This effect has a short cooldown.

so35a-28.name: Scatter Blast
description: Casting Static Orb sends out smaller orbs in a cone in front of you. These small orbs can hit the same target as the large orb, but cannot explode and do not pull.

ss3tre-2.name: Icy Flow
description: Shatter Strike costs less mana and grants you ward when you attack with it and hit at least one enemy.
reminderText: Additional casts from the {Whiteout} node on this tree cannot grant additional ward.

ss3tre-3.name: Frostbitten
description: Shatter Strike has a chance to inflict enemies with {Frostbite}.

ss3tre-4.name: Razor Ice
description: {Frostbite} inflicted by Shatter Strike has additional Cold Penetration.

ss3tre-5.name: Chillflame
description: Shatter Strike hits convert all stacks of ignite on enemies into {Frostbite}.

ss3tre-6.name: Absolute Zero
description: Shatter Strike deals more damage, but has less attack speed (both multiplicative with other modifiers).

ss3tre-7.name: Cold Presence
description:
Shatter Strike deals more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers).

This effect is doubled against enemies at high health.
reminderText: Targets above 65% max health are considered to be at high health.

ss3tre-8.name: Shiver
description: Shatter Strike deals damage in a larger area and penetrates enemy cold resistance.

ss3tre-9.name: Cold Steel
description: Shatter Strikes critical strikes deal more damage per equipped sword.

ss3tre-10.name: Obliteration
description: Shatter Strike's instant kill on frozen enemies occurs at a higher health threshold.

ss3tre-11.name: Winter's Boon
description: Shatter Strike grants mana when it kills a frozen enemy.

ss3tre-12.name: Arctic Blast
description: Enemies hit by both of Shatter Strikes arcs are knocked back.

ss3tre-13.name: Rimestrike
description: Shatter Strike chills enemies.

ss3tre-14.name: Frigid Zephyr
description: Shatter Strike grants {Haste} for two seconds when it kills a frozen enemy.

ss3tre-15.name: Breadth of Cold
description: Shatter Strike deals more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers) in a larger area.

ss3tre-16.name: Whiteout
description: Shatter Strike recasts after it finishes, but costs more mana and has less attack speed (multiplicative with other modifiers). You can use other skills during the recasts.

ss3tre-17.name: Iceblink
notScalingStats: Cannot Use With Wand Or Two Hander
description: Shatter Strike has increased attack speed, but cannot be used if you have a wand or two-handed weapon equipped.

ss3tre-18.name: Lingering Chill
description: You deal more cold damage (multiplicative with other modifiers) and are more likely to freeze enemies if you have used Shatter Strike recently (past 4 seconds).

ss3tre-19.name: Ice Barrier
description:
When you use and hit at least one enemy with Shatter Strike, you gain additional armor for 4 seconds.

This effect is doubled if you hit a frozen enemy.

ss3tre-20.name: Acclimated
stats: 5% Less Cold Damage Taken On Hit
description:
You take less cold damage (multiplicative with other modifiers) for 4 seconds after hitting an enemy with Shatter Strike. 

This effect is doubled when hitting a frozen enemy.

ss3tre-21.name: Hoarfrost
description:
You gain ward when you use Shatter Strike and hit at least one enemy.

This effect is doubled if you hit a frozen enemy.
reminderText: Additional casts from the {Whiteout} node on this tree cannot grant additional ward.

ss3tre-22.name: Frozen Shrapnel
description: Shatter Strike fires {Ice Spikes} from the edge of its area of effect.
reminderText: {Ice Spikes} are cold spells. They scale with intelligence, spell damage, and cold damage.

ss3tre-23.name: Frigid Efficacy
description: {Ice Spikes} deal more damage and move faster, causing them to travel farther.
reminderText: {Ice spikes} are cold spells. They scale with intelligence, spell damage, and cold damage.

ss3tre-24.name: Solidify
description: Shatter Strike has a higher chance to freeze enemies.

ss3tre-25.name: Glacial Smash
description:
Shatter Strike's hits deal more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers).

This effect is doubled against frozen enemies.
reminderText: Multiplicative with other modifiers

ss3tre-26.name: Unrelenting Winter
description: Shatter Strike leaves a patch of {Frozen Ground} for 5 seconds, which chills enemies who walk on it each second.

st47ic-2.name: High Voltage
description: You gain charges faster while moving.

st47ic-3.name: Shock Armour
description: Enemies that hit you are shocked while you have more than 80 charges.

st47ic-4.name: Stormchaser
description: You gain charges while moving much faster, but charges decay at your movement charge rate if you stop moving for more than 1 second.

st47ic-5.name: Overcharge
description: You have a higher maximum amount of charges.

st47ic-6.name: Momentum
description: You gain {Haste} for 1 second per 50 charges when you discharge.

st47ic-7.name: Arcblast
description: Discharge has a significantly higher range, but can only hit enemies within a 90 degree arc.

st47ic-8.name: Reach
description: Discharge has a higher range the more charges you have.

st47ic-9.name: Critical Mass
description: Discharges critical strikes deal more damage if you have over 100 charges when you discharge.

st47ic-10.name: Surge
description: You gain charges for each enemy you critically strike if you have discharged in the last 3 seconds.

st47ic-11.name: Empower
description: Discharge deals additional spell lightning damage (doubled if you have at least 80 charges).

st47ic-12.name: Electrify
description: Improves Discharges base critical strike chance.

st47ic-13.name: Lightning Cleave
description: Discharge hits an additional enemy for every 50 charges you have when you discharge.

st47ic-14.name: Power Surge
description: When you directly cast Static, Discharge deals additional lightning damage per charge, but Discharge costs more mana per charge.

st47ic-15.name: Reverberation
description: You gain more charges when you are hit.

st47ic-16.name: Insulation
description: Discharge grants ward proportional to your charges, but has a longer cooldown.

st47ic-17.name: Forked Lightning
description: Discharge hits more enemies.

st47ic-18.name: Kickstart
description: Static's cooldown resets when you reach your maximum number of charges.

st47ic-19.name: Overload
description: While over 80 charges, you expend 10 charges to cast {Lightning Blast} at an enemy within 8 meters every second. This effect consumes Lightning Blast's mana cost.

st47ic-20.name: Stabilizing Current
description: {Lightning Blast} critical hits have a chance to grant a charge.
reminderText: This affects all of your casts of Lightning Blast, not just from {Overload}.

st47ic-21.name: Diode
description: Lightning Blasts from {Overload} have additional critical strike chance and a chance to chain additional times.

st47ic-22.name: Unlimited Power
description: {Lightning Blasts} from {Overload} consume less of Lightning Blast's mana cost, but expends additional charges.

st47ic-23.name: Electrode
description: Discharge shocks enemies on hit. Each enemy is inflicted with 1 stack of shock for each 50 charges expended, up to a maximum.

st47ic-24.name: Imbued Lightning
stats: +4 Additional Spell And Melee Lightning Damage
description: After discharging, your next spell and melee attack deal additional lightning damage.

st47ic-25.name: Thunder's Wrath
description: Discharge now has a chance to stun enemies, with a higher chance based the number of charges you have.

st47ic-26.name: Oscillate
description: Nearby enemies are knocked back when you discharge.

st47ic-27.name: Fulminating Blows
description: Your next melee attack grants charges on hit. This effect has a 1 second cooldown.

su5g3-0.name: Surge
description: Quick fixed distance dash which hits all enemies in the path with a lightning melee attack.

su5g3-1.name: Jolt
description: Surge shocks enemies and has an increased chance to stun.

su5g3-2.name: Expanse
description: Surge deals damage in a larger area.

su5g3-3.name: Stagnant
description: Surge {Immobilizes} enemies hit for a short duration.

su5g3-4.name: Charged Movement
description: Surge has a chance to apply a {Spark Charge} on enemies.

su5g3-5.name: Crackling Blades
description:
Shock applied by Surge has increased duration per equipped sword.

{Spark Charges} applied by Surge deal more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers) per equipped sword.
reminderText: If you have the {Glacial Assault} node then this increases frostbite duration instead of shock duration, and if you have the {Flaming Surge} node it increases ignite duration instead of shock duration. However, regardless of these nodes, this node always increases spark charge damage.

su5g3-6.name: Shocking Blows
description: Surge deals additional melee lightning damage.

su5g3-7.name: Lightning Rush
description: Surge deals more damage per 1% of movement speed (multiplicative with other modifiers).

su5g3-8.name: Shielding Advance
description: You are invulnerable while Surging.

su5g3-9.name: Dynamics
description: Surge has increased duration, causing you to move slower.
reminderText: This does not affect the total distance travelled.

su5g3-10.name: Conduit
description: Surge deals more lightning damage per 4 {Static Charges} you have when you use Surge (multiplicative with other modifiers).

su5g3-11.name: Static Buildup
description: Gain {Static Charges} when you use Surge.

su5g3-12.name: Capacitator
description: You gain {Static Charges} on hit with Surge.

su5g3-13.name: Discharge
description: You cast {Static} on arrival with Surge.

su5g3-14.name: Effluence
description: Improves Surge's base critical strike chance and you gain ward on crit with Surge.

su5g3-15.name: Longstrider
description: You travel further with Surge.

su5g3-16.name: Storm Aegis
description: You gain ward if Surge hits at least one enemy.

su5g3-17.name: Shielding Efflux
description: You gain ward on hit with Surge.

su5g3-18.name: Glacial Assault
description:
Surge's base lightning damage is converted to cold. Consequently this damage scales with increases to cold damage, but not increases to lightning damage. It also has a chance to freeze enemies.

Shock chance from all sources is converted to {Frostbite} chance and effects related to shock now depend on Frostbite instead.

Swaps Surge's {Lightning} tag for a {Cold} tag.

su5g3-19.name: Coldfront
description: Surge causes a {Tidal Wave} to continue past the arrival point, dealing spell cold damage and chills enemies.

su5g3-20.name: Cryomantic Path
description: Surge has a higher chance to freeze enemies and deals more cold damage (multiplicative with other modifiers).

su5g3-21.name: Stormbringer
description: You now cast {Lightning Blast} on arrival with Surge. This uses Lightning Blast's mana cost.

su5g3-22.name: Electropulse
description: You now cast {Lightning Blasts} while travelling with Surge. This uses Lightning Blast's mana cost.

su5g3-23.name: Ride the Lightning
description: Surge now moves you in a zig zag motion rather than a straight line and deals more spell lightning damage (multiplicative with other modifiers).

su5g3-24.name: Storm Battery
description: While Surge is on cooldown, using a melee attack and hitting at least one enemy grants you a stack of {Dormant Energy} up to a maximum. Using Surge again consumes all stacks to deal more damage per stack (multiplicative with other modifiers).

su5g3-25.name: Insulation
description: Consuming stacks of {Dormant Energy} grants you ward per stack consumed.
reminderText: This has no effect if you have [cold conversion node].

su5g3-26.name: Fulmination
description: You have a chance to cast {Fire Aura} when you consume a stack of {Dormant Energy}.

su5g3-27.name: Flaming Surge
description:
Surge's base lightning damage is converted to fire. Consequently this damage scales with increases to fire damage, but not increases to lightning damage. 

Shock chance from all sources is converted to ignite chance and effects related to shock now depend on ignite instead.

Swaps Surge's {Lightning} tag for a {Fire} tag.

Has no effect if you have the {Glacial Assault} node.

su5g3-28.name: Pyroclasm
description: Surge causes a {Flame Reave} to continue past the arrival point, a melee attack dealing fire damage in a cone in front of you. This effect costs Flame Reave's mana cost as well.

su5g3-30.name: Concentrated Current
description: Surge deals more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers) but you travel a shorter distance.

sw31a-2.name: Adept
description: Snap Freeze has increased cast speed.

sw31a-3.name: Flash Freeze
description: Snap Freeze has a shorter cooldown, but Freeze inflicted by Snap Freeze has reduced duration.

sw31a-4.name: Gale Force
description: Snap Freeze knocks enemies back.

sw31a-5.name: Lasting Cold
description: Snap Freeze has a chance to chill enemies.

sw31a-6.name: Permafrost
description: Chill caused by Snap Freeze has increased duration. If you have taken the {Snap Shock} node, this increases Shock duration instead.
reminderText: If you have taken the Snap Shock node then this increases shock duration instead.

sw31a-7.name: Shatter
description: Snap Freeze hits and deals spell cold damage and can apply on-hit effects, but costs more mana.
reminderText: This damage has an added damage scaling of 100%, and is increased by your increases to cold damage and spell damage.

sw31a-8.name: Deathly cold
description: Snap Freeze hits deal additional spell cold damage.

sw31a-9.name: Snap Shock
stats: 4 Lightning Damage Per Second Of Freeze
description:
Snap Freeze no longer freezes and its base cold damage is converted to lightning damage. Consequently this damage scales with increases to lightning damage, but not increases to cold damage.

Adds 4 lighting damage for each second of freeze duration. 

All chill chance is converted to shock chance, and all nodes which rely on targets being frozen or chilled now work on shocked enemies instead.
reminderText: Shock reduces lightning resistance by 5%, increases chance to be stunned by 10%, lasts 4 seconds, and can stack up to 20 times. It has 60% reduced effect against bosses and players.

sw31a-10.name: Focused Current
description: Improves Snap Freezes base critical strike chance.

sw31a-11.name: Electrocute
description: Snap Freeze critical strikes deal more damage.

sw31a-12.name: Spark Surge
description: Snap Freeze hits deal more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers) per stack of {Shock} on the target.

sw31a-13.name: Snow Flurry
description: Snap Freeze costs less mana and has a shorter cooldown.

sw31a-14.name: Frostbite
description: Snap Freeze inflicts {Frostbite} on all enemies within its area of effect.

sw31a-15.name: Deadly Aurora
description: {Frostbite} inflicted by Snap Freeze has additional Cold Penetration.

sw31a-16.name: Frozen Ground
description: Snap Freeze leaves a patch of {Frozen Ground} for 5 seconds, which chills all enemies who walk on it. Frostbite inflicted by Snap Freeze last longer.

sw31a-17.name: Focused Frost
description: Snap Freeze costs less mana, but has a narrower area of effect.

sw31a-18.name: Wandering Fog
description: Snap Freezes area of effect extends further away from you.

sw31a-19.name: Freezing Mist
description: Freeze inflicted by Snap Freeze has a longer duration, but has a narrower area of effect.

sw31a-20.name: Shiver Armor
description: You have additional armor and cold resistance while Snap Freeze is on cooldown.

sw31a-21.name: Cryomancy
description: Freeze inflicted by Snap Freeze last longer.

sw31a-22.name: Sap Warmth
description: You steal cold resistance from enemies hit by Snap Freeze, causing you to gain cold resistance for 4 seconds and the enemies hit to lose it.
reminderText: This still works on enemies with 0% elemental resistance; it causes their elemental resistance to become negative causing them to take more damage.

sw31a-23.name: Memory of Frost
description: You can store an additional charge of Snap Freeze, but Snap Freeze has a longer cooldown.

sw31a-24.name: Frozen Monolith
description: Snap Freeze also freezes yourself for 2 seconds. You cannot take damage while frozen this way.

te44-2.name: Unstable Arrival
description: Teleport knocks enemies back from your destination once you arrive.

te44-3.name: Frigid Departure
description: You have have a higher chance to freeze enemies if you have cast Teleport recently (past 4 seconds).

te44-4.name: Mana Tunnel
description: After casting Teleport your next direct spell cast refunds its mana cost, but Teleport has a longer cooldown.

te44-5.name: Tunnel Finder
description: Teleport has a shorter cooldown.

te44-6.name: Crystaline Passage
description: You have higher cold resistance and armor if you have cast Teleport recently (past 4 seconds).

te44-7.name: Time Dilation
description: Stat buffs granted by having cast Teleport recently (past 4 seconds) last longer.

te44-8.name: Decoy Position
description: Teleport creates a {Mirror Image} where you depart. Mirror Images count as minions and will taunt nearby enemies for 10 seconds, then disappear. Teleport costs more mana.
reminderText: {Mirror Image} health scales with intelligence and level.

te44-9.name: Unexpected Copy
description: Teleport creates a {Mirror Image} where you arrive. Mirror Images count as minions and will taunt nearby enemies for 10 seconds, then disappear. Teleport costs more mana.
reminderText: {Mirror Image} health scales with intelligence and level.

te44-10.name: Uncontrolled Duplication
description: Teleport creates additional {Mirror Images} on arrival. Mirror images have a shorter duration.
reminderText: {Mirror Image} health scales with intelligence and level.

te44-11.name: Stable Duplicants
description: {Mirror Images} last longer.
reminderText: {Mirror Image} health scales with intelligence and level.

te44-12.name: Ether Barrier
description: Teleport grants ward on cast.

te44-13.name: Out of Mind
stats: 1 Ward Gained Per Point Of Intelligence
description: When you use Teleport, you are granted ward equal to your intelligence stat.

te44-14.name: Stable Bubble
description: You have increased ward retention if you have cast Teleport recently (past 4 seconds).
reminderText: Recently refers to the past 4 seconds

te44-15.name: Resonant Plasma
description: You have higher lightning resistance, fire resistance, and stun avoidance if you have cast Teleport recently (past 4 seconds).

te44-16.name: Intense Arrival
description: Teleport knocks enemies further back.

te44-17.name: Flicker
description: Teleport costs less mana.

te44-18.name: Wormhole
description: Your other skills recover more quickly if you have cast Teleport recently (past 4 seconds).
reminderText: Recently refers to the past 4 seconds

te44-19.name: Elemental Affinity
description: You deal increased elemental damage if you have cast Teleport recently (past 4 seconds).
reminderText: Recently refers to the past 4 seconds

te44-20.name: Elemental Dawn
description:
Teleport casts Elemental Nova where you arrive.

This node does not work if Elemental Nova has a cooldown.

te44-21.name: Elemental Dusk
description:
Teleport casts Elemental Nova where you depart.

This node does not work if Elemental Nova has a cooldown.

te44-22.name: Elemental Midnight
description:
Teleport casts Elemental Nova halfway between your arrival and departure points.

This node does not work if Elemental Nova has a cooldown.

te44-23.name: Out of Body
description: Casting Teleport converts a percentage of your current health into twice as much ward.
reminderText: For example if you have three points in this node, and 100 current health, you will lose 9 health and gain 18 ward.

te44-24.name: Rock Phase
description: You cannot be stunned if you have cast Teleport recently (past 4 seconds).

te44-26.name: Comet Rush
description: Teleport has a shorter cooldown and if you have {Haste} when you cast Teleport its duration is reset.
reminderText: This cannot reduce the duration of Haste on you, only increase it or leave it unchanged.

vm53dx-2.name: Resolute Stance
description: Focus grants increased health regeneration while channeled.

vm53dx-3.name: Desperate Meditation
stats: 1% Increased Mana Regen Per Missing Mana
description: Focus grants increased mana regeneration while channeled proportional to the amount of mana you are missing when you start channeling.
reminderText: Each point of negative mana counts as missing an addional point of mana. For example, with 1 point invested, if you have 10 maximum mana and are at -10 mana then this node will increase mana regen by 20%.

vm53dx-4.name: Null Profusion
description: Casting Focus while at negative mana instantly grants mana equal to a percentage of your maximum mana, but Focus has a longer cooldown.

vm53dx-5.name: Null Infusion
description: Casting Focus while at negative mana instantly grants mana equal to a percentage of your maximum mana, but Focus has a longer cooldown.

vm53dx-6.name: Calm Mind
stats: Instant Mana Gain Also Applies To Ward
description: The mana gained from the Null Profusion and Null Infusion nodes is also gained as ward, but Focus has a longer cooldown.

vm53dx-7.name: Mana Flooded
description: Focus grants increased mana regeneration while channeled.

vm53dx-8.name: Shocking Aura
description: Focus grants a chance to shock nearby enemies each second while channeled and causes you to take less damage from shocked enemies (multiplicative with other modifiers).

vm53dx-9.name: Nerve Center
description: Shocks, chills and ignites inflicted by Focus have a longer duration.

vm53dx-10.name: Burning Aura
description: Focus grants a chance to ignite nearby enemies each second while channeled and causes you to take less damage from ignited enemies (multiplicative with other modifiers).

vm53dx-11.name: Iron Stance
description: Focus heightens your armor while channeling (multiplicative with other modifiers) and grants you additional armor based on your intelligence.

vm53dx-12.name: Chilling Aura
description: Focus grants a chance to chill nearby enemies each second while channeled and causes you to take less damage from chilled enemies (multiplicative with other modifiers).

vm53dx-13.name: Prismatic Stance
description: Focus grants less elemental damage taken while channeled (multiplicative with other modifiers).

vm53dx-14.name: Inner Growth
description: Focus heals the target each second while channeled.
reminderText: This effect is affected by increased healing effectiveness.

vm53dx-15.name: Mind's Eye
description: Focus has increased healing effectiveness per point of intelligence.

vm53dx-16.name: Overcharge
description: Focus can increase your current mana to a percentage above your maximum mana. The excess decays at a rate of 10 mana per second after you stop channeling.

vm53dx-17.name: Prism Barrier
description: Focus grants additional resistance while channeled.

vm53dx-18.name: Friendly Focus
description: Focus can be cast on allies.
reminderText: All effects granted by Focus are applied to the ally instead unless they specify "you".

vm53dx-19.name: Everward
description: Focus grants additional ward retention while channeled.

vm53dx-20.name: Energy Battery
description: When you finish channeling, you unleash a wave of lightning with base damage equal to a percentage of the mana you gained while channeling.
reminderText: The lightning wave counts as a spell, and its damage scales with Intelligence.
