vm53dx-21.name: Energy Infusion
description: You gain Haste for 1 second per 20 mana you gained while channeling once you finish channeling. Maximum of 10 seconds.

vm53dx-22.name: Mind's Shield
description: You gain ward equal to a percentage of the mana you gained once you finish channeling.

vm53dx-23.name: Energy Overflow
description: You unleash waves of lightning with base damage equal to a percentage of your maximum mana to nearby enemies each second while channeling.
reminderText: If cast on an ally, the waves of lightning will occur at their location.

vm53dx-24.name: Rapid Overflow
description: {Energy Overflow} is cast more frequently.

vm53dx-25.name: Unstable Energy
description: The waves of lightning released by the Energy Overflow and Energy Battery nodes deal more damage while you are at full mana (multiplicative with other modifiers).

vm53dx-26.name: Mind Shell
description: Focus grants additional ward per second while channeled.

vm53dx-27.name: Revelation
description: The burst of ward and mana after channelling for exactly one second grants additional ward and mana.

vm53dx-28.name: Unbound Thought
description:
Focus no longer has a cooldown, but the burst no longer grants mana.

This node has no effect if you have either the {Null Profusion} node or the {Conveyance} node.

vm53dx-30.name: Conveyance
stats: Does not use the Teleport Skill or Tree
description:
You teleport to the target location when you start channelling Focus, as long as the location is accessible. This does not count as casting the Teleport skill and is not affected by Teleport's skill tree.

Focus now counts as a {Traversal} skill.
reminderText: Using a Traversal skill puts all other traversal skills on cooldown and traversal skills' cooldowns do not recover while you are using a traversal skill.

vo54-0.name: Dense Orb
description: Volcanic Orb fires additional {Shrapnel} from its final explosion.

vo54-3.name: Frozen Orb
description: Volcanic Orb is converted into Frozen Orb. Base fire damage is converted to cold for Frozen Orb and the skill effects it creates. Consequently this damage scales with increases to cold damage, but not with increases to fire damage.
reminderText: Frozen orb scales with increases to cold damage not fire damage.\n\nThe orb itself has a freeze rate of 40, the shrapnel has a freeze rate of 32, and explosions created at the start or end have a freeze rate of 100.

vo54-4.name: Winter's Fury
description: {Shrapnel}, {Explosive Orb} and {Fire Glyph} have a chance to chill enemies.

vo54-5.name: Glacial Might
description: {Shrapnels} hits deal more damage against chilled enemies (multiplicative with other modifiers).

vo54-6.name: Volatile Emission
description: {Shrapnel} travels faster, causing it to also travel further. Shrapnel is created more frequently.

vo54-7.name: Orb of Speed
description:
Volcanic Orb core and {Shrapnel} deal more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers), but Volcanic Orb has a duration of 2 seconds. 

If you have taken the {Explosive Ground} node, Volcanic Orb leaves Explosive Ground more frequently.
reminderText: If you have taken the {Explosive Ground} node, Volcanic Orb leaves Explosive Ground more frequently.

vo54-8.name: Pyroclastic Speed
description: You have increased cast Speed with Volcanic Orb, and Volcanic Orb travels faster, causing it to also travel further.

vo54-9.name: Ash Pelting
description: {Shrapnel} has an increased chance to stun enemies.

vo54-10.name: Eruption
description: {Shrapnel} deals more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers).

vo54-11.name: Piercing Embers
description: {Shrapnel} pierces enemies (continues through enemies it hits).

vo54-12.name: Explosive Ground
description: Volcanic Orb leaves {Explosive Ground} as it travels, which explode after 3 seconds, dealing fire damage to enemies within its area of effect. Volcanic Orb costs significantly more mana.
reminderText:
{Explosive Ground} scales with increases to fire damage and spell damage, but not with other nodes on this tree.

Modifiers to the damage of Volcanic Orb's core also apply to Explosive Ground.

vo54-13.name: Tectonic Orb
description: Volcanic Orb leaves {Explosive Ground} more frequently, but costs more mana.
reminderText: {Explosive Ground} scales with increases to fire damage and spell damage, but not with other nodes on this tree.

vo54-14.name: Controlled Eruption
description: Volcanic Orb costs less mana, but moves slower and has a duration of 2 seconds.
reminderText: If you have taken the {Explosive Ground} node, Volcanic Orb leaves Explosive Ground more frequently.

vo54-15.name: Explosive Orb
description: Volcanic Orb creates a large explosion at the end of its duration, dealing fire damage.
reminderText: The explosive scales with increases to fire damage and spell damage, but not with other nodes on this tree.

vo54-16.name: Glyph of Fire
description: Casting Volcanic Orb creates a {Fire Glyph} at your feet which explodes after 1.3 seconds, creating a {Fire Nova}.
reminderText: The explosion scales with increases to fire damage and spell damage, but not with other nodes on this tree.

vo54-17.name: Fiery Runes
description: Explosions from {Explosive Orb} and {Glyph of Fire} deal more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers).

vo54-18.name: Mark of the Inferno
description: Explosions from {Explosive Orb} and {Glyph of Fire} have a chance to ignite enemies.

vo54-19.name: Molten Core
description: Volcanic Orb's core deals more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers).

vo54-20.name: Infernal Caster
description: Volcanic Orb's core, {Shrapnel} and {Explosive Orb} hits deal more damage, but Volcanic Orb costs more mana and has less cast speed (multiplicative with other modifiers).

vo54-21.name: Monolithic Eruption
description: Volcanic Orb's core and {Shrapnel} deal more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers), but Shrapnel is created less frequently.

vo54-22.name: Freezing Orb
description: Frozen Orb has an increased chance to freeze enemies.

vo54-23.name: Volcanic Tether
description: Volcanic Orb moves slower for each second it exists.

vo54-24.name: Volcanic Acceleration
description: Volcanic Orb's core deals more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers), and it accelerates, moving faster for each second it exists.

vo54-25.name: Volcanic Frenzy
description: Volcanic Orb has a shorter cooldown.

vo54-26.name: Concentrated Effect
description: Volcanic Orb's core hits deals more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers), but Volcanic Orb no longer creates {Shrapnel} when it ends.

vo54-27.name: Lava Flow
description: Volcanic Orb costs less mana.
